name: Speedy Stacks
description: Test your hand eye coordination as you tap to drop the blocks and stack to the goal line. Things get difficult quickly as you cruise through the levels in Speedy Stacks!

name: Sticky Castle
description:
The story of how a group of sticky blobs are going to rescue the Queen of Stickiness who is held captive in a big castle! During this adventure, our sticky friends will use their stickiness to fight enemies while avoiding dangerous traps and escaping from a deadly pool of lava, yikes! They will also smash bottles to pieces. A lot of bottles.
Sticky Castle is an exciting fast paced action game, that is easy to control, but definitely very, very hard to master. Help your slimy and sticky friends to rescue the Queen of Stickiness. Use your strategy and timing skills to perform incredible stunts, avoid dangerous hazards, defeat enemies, complete missions and just be epic. Do you have what it takes to reach the top?

name: Afterplace
description:
Afterplace is an adventurous indie game for mobile devices. It's a huge open world, full of hidden secrets, treasures, and creatures. You'll run around the woods, fight monsters, and talk to ostensibly shady characters! All from your pocket! Be warned though - you never know what the forest might be hiding, and not all trails are paved. Labyrinths and dungeons are tucked away in the most concealed nooks. There are no waypoints in Afterplace. You'll have to forge your own path.

Afterplace has been designed from the ground up to be a fast, fluid, beautiful experience for mobile. There are no virtual buttons. You can move and attack by touching anywhere. You can tap objects directly to interact or attack, or use two thumbs like a traditional controller. The game will adapt dynamically to your play style. Pick up and set down the game at your own pace, it will always save your progress. Afterplace is made to feel like a full-fledged indie adventure game that fits in your pocket.

name: Catch Bus
description: We've all been there. Your bus comes and it's a race to the bus stop. Play 3 levels of difficulty in catching the bus! Run!!

name: Talking Tom Time Rush
description:
Run fast through the Magic Gate! Tom, Angela, Hank, Ben, Ginger and Becca dash into an awesome adventure together!
Talking Tom Time Rush is the all-new runner game! Tom and friends have found a Magic Gate but the Rakoonz crash the fun. They steal the Crystals and escape into a fantastic world!
Players join Tom and friends as they jump into wonderful worlds, explore unique side paths and discover special surprises together. It’s an epic chase after those rascal Rakoonz to recover the Crystals!

name: Minor Miner: Mining Action
description: Avoid the High-Tech Goblins and Conquer the Mines!

name: Slingshot Blitz: Rewarded Play
description:
This is the first Slingshot Shooter Game of its kind, with real-world rewards and cash prizes (where available)! Shoot the bottles strategically to earn the most points and win the game.
A quick and enjoyable Slingshot Shooter that is easy to learn but challenging to master.

name: Swap.
description: Swap. is a funny match-3 & erasing game.

name: Pizza Turtle 4evr
description: Be the turtle. Eat the pizza. Eat pizza 4evr. Tap to fly and eat pizza.

name: TaiWord: A Daily Word Game
description: Welcome to TaiWord. A fun new daily word game! Every day you must solve the 5, 7 and 10 letter anagrams - You are against the clock, how fast can you solve them? You also can play Multi TaiWord, a brand new mode where you have 5 minutes to guess as many words from 8 letters! With 10 leaderboards, see if you are fastest everyday or if you have the best TaiWord streak! TaiWord is a fun way to train your brain but also learn new words with definitions for each word!

name: Four Horsemen
description:
Four Horsemen, a battle strategy game, provides you with an outlet to multiple gameplay based strategies. It is available for everyone who desires to play a survival adventure game with revolutionary war game layouts. You can jump into this adventure anytime, anywhere to defend your troops in battle and protect your shelter, offering MMO strategy challenge missions for players to play in their free time in an online multiplayer style format.
Stay alive in this post-apocalyptic battleground by battling unexpected enemies and outwitting top strategic alliances. Hone in your strategic skills by upgrading your troops, developing captain enhancements, and joining up with others to fight for survival.

name: Ridiculous RPG
description:
Ridiculous RPG - Boy - Hurry to School is a 8-bit RPG game. You are 'Boy', a 15 years old student who is hurrying to school to take the exam. On the way to school, you aware that the 'Dark Power' is awakening, the power that can destroy the world!
On the other hand, another character called 'Kid' is going to investigate the boss behind the power. During the investigation, Kid's real memory is gradually awakening. Kid is not a normal kid. He has a dangerous power that is much dangerous than the Dark Power, the power that can destroy the whole galaxy!!!
You'll encounter different monsters in different dungeons. Fight the monsters with cards. Choose a 'Sword' card if you're going to attack the monster. Choose a 'Shield' card if you're going to protect yourself. There are also 16 'Special Cards' during the battle. e.g. Poisons the enemy
You'll get coins and knowledge points in the game. Use coins to upgrade weapons. Use knowledge points to study hard in academic subjects to increase your own strength. Defeat the monsters to gain experience.

name: Dig!t
description: There are three simple rules + one secret rule. Tap on an empty field to fill it with a number. Each tap increases the existing number by 1. Adjacent boxes filled with a number increase each other.

name: Pop-a-Chick
description:
A fun, simple and intuitive 10-minute carnival style skills game to play and replay to beat high scores.
Grandma & Grandpa are at the carnival for the day, you're in charge. Don't let the chickens out and catch 'em quick before they return!
Inspired from traditional bean bag toss with a touch of rhythm and surprises at each level. The chickens escape randomly for a unique challenge every time.
Includes awesome Bluegrass music which you can also mute to play your favorite tunes in the background player of your choice.

name: Dead Giveaway: Zombie Quiz
description:
The game show of the dead. Don't let the zombies rattle your nerves, earn your freedom before it's too late.
In this zombie quiz game, you will have to answer some of the craziest questions and pit your wits against the leader of the zombie revolution.

name: MapaboX: Trivia & Quiz game
description:
If you love TV shows like “Who Wants to Be a Millionaire?” Or “The weakest link”, then you will definitely like mapaboX.
The game consists of 10 rounds and up to 4 people can participate in it.
The goal of the game is to get maximum points. Your knowledge, intelligence and ability to make the right move will be the key to winning this game.
If you want to have fun with your loved ones, friends or other people from all over the world, mapaboX is a great choice! It doesn't matter if you speak the same language.

name: Candy Adventure HD
description:
Forgive us, can not give you a bottle of drink. But to believe that we can give you a different experience
Go into the Candy Adventure, We will give you a cool summer.

name: Fall Jo!
description: In this challenging game a ball is falling by gravity. Your goal is to guide the ball to the ground by avoiding nasty obstacles. Tap the screen and get a boost. This way you can get through the obstacles. Game Center for high score leaderboards!

name: Islands and Ships logic puzzle
description:
Islands and Ships logic puzzle has a really delightful gameplay and it can be a great brain training tool for you as it features 1700+ logical problems divided into 1700+ levels and will allow you to have a lot of fun while providing amazing brain exercise.
You can enjoy this solitaire logic puzzle game offline for hours anytime, and it's free to download!

name: Magic Memory Match Free
description:
Magic Memory Match is a matching game featuring basic elementary level themes with some fun ones thrown in. See how fast you can match all of the cards! Keep track of your best time for each category.
A magical matching game, fun for players young and old!

name: Icontrivia: Guess All Things Christmas
description: From Santa Claus to Rudolph and all their friends in North Pole, it’s time to guess all things Christmas! Guess all your favorite things about Christmas from decorations, traditions, characters, foods, clothes and others, in this highly addictive word guessing game.

name: Stay in the White Line: Level Version
description:
It’s never been so easy to play, you just have to control ball on the screen and try to stay in the white line reach the goal.
The game is the test of your patience and the stability of the hand. Complete the level is not difficult, but it's hard to better scores. Can you complete within 3 seconds?

name: Wolf Boot Camp
description:
Do you know the three little pigs and the wolf story? Do you know the story about the wolf after it? If you know or do not know, Come and try this game. If you are looking for a fun game, Come and try this game.
Wolf Boot Camp is a young wolf on the story of growth and exercise.

name: Emoji 2 Words: Guess and Sort
description: Emoji 2 Words Guess and Sort is a brain challenging puzzle game. Search and find hidden English words by combining two or more emojis .

name: IG Arena: Idle RPG
description:
When the three realms of Heaven, Mortal, and Hell were experiencing a chaotic period, their kings started to become greedy. All of them craving for a throne that could dominate the three realms, and their desire leads them to an epic war that seems to be endless.
Participate with thousands of players in a NEW AFK 5v5 PvP interesting game ever! Summoning immortal gods, build your own squad, collecting gems, diamond, lethal weapons and many more attractive items.
Who will be the Only King? Drown into our addictive Idle RPG battle of Immortal Gods Arena to find out!

name: Line Points: Challenge your coordination
description: This is a game that very test coordination of hands, you need to use both hands to control two points on the screen, through angle forming from the line between two points to control the movement of the ball, eat stars as much as possible. There are 6 balls in the game for players to switch, respectively, basketball, football, tennis, billiards, golf, baseball. Each ball has fixed weight and flexible setup, and there will be a totally different sense for control.

name: Flappy Dot Up!
description:
The game is really simple,But you can't stop it!
Tap the screen to jump,Avoid the moving square.How long can you get!

name: What Belongs?Find Hidden Words
description:
Follow the given hints to reach the hidden word.
The less tips you use, the more points you collect.
The new dimension in the word puzzles.
Are you ready for sleeplessness?

name: Football Players Quiz
description: Test Your Football knowledge with our Football Players quiz!  Guess the names of the top 275 football players by correctly identifying their face. To help you along the way you can earn hints and tips as well as stars that will reveal the less obvious ones! If you still get stuck you can also ask a friend on Facebook and Twitter to help you with the answer.  So you think you know football? Lets see how far you get....    More Tips for your success:  Type the full name of the player for maximum points or alternatively type just the first name, surname or nickname for a pass.

name: Font Quiz
description:
Can you recognise these famous fonts from movies, brands, video games, tv shows and bands?
Font Quiz is a free app with more than 200 different fonts to identify. Simply tap on a font and type in the name..

name: 3D Icon Quiz
description: Let's play 3D Icon Quiz. More than 300 common icons/pictograms in the world!

name: God of Math: Train Your Brain
description: The overall difficulty level is so that elementary school students can enjoy it, and play and enjoy the four rules operation as a game.

name: Game of Skulls
description:
In Game of Skulls you are playing against an AI, trying to predict its moves and come up with a counter strategy. The rules are simple but coming up with the right strategy is a serious challenge.
Both you and the AI start with 12 cards. In each round, you both play a card on different stacks collecting penalty points. Whoever has the least amount of penalty points at the end wins. You can play multiple rounds and keep track of your overall score.
The game has two difficulty modes. One mode for beginners that doesn't keep a persistent score and a challenge mode.

name: WordPlus: Unique Word Game
description:
WordPlus is a word search build game to test your word power and analytical thinking power.
You have to plan your moves wisely to defeat your opponent.

name: Trivia Town: Quiz Duel
description:
Knowledge is the key element in Trivia Town. You compete to see who knows the most and can come up with the biggest amount of right answers. Trivia Town is all about quizzing, and you battle friends and new faces. With 20,000 questions, the game is a constant challenge. If you are a genius, it will soon become apparent to all, when you take part in this fair and fun online pop quiz feud. Even though fairness ranks high within Trivia Town, you still have the opportunity to influence your fight against your opponents. When you play the game, you can bet on your answers. For every question, you can choose whether to bet 1, 2, 3, 4 or 5 points when you submit your answer. In this way, you can crack your opponent in one of two ways: By being the biggest knowledge genius, or by playing the game strategically. In other words: Trivia Town is a challenge for all types of players.
A battle within Trivia Town takes just under two minutes, so finding time for a quick pop quiz and a fun game between friends is nearly always possible. The 20,000 questions are divided into ten topics: Music, Movies & TV, Geography, Society & Politics, Science & Tech, Nature, Sports & Games, Food & Drink, History and Art & Literature.
To help you look for the right answer every question has been equipped with a picture. At the same time, you get to play in peace, free from disturbing ads and unfair power ups. We have worked hard to make sure that Trivia Town is a “clean” brain exercise with no interruptions.

name: Word Cafe 21
description:
Are you looking for a unique and challenging word game? In Word Cafe 21 you are presented with words related to a topic. The letters are all scrambled and you have to move them into the right places to guess the words. Sounds easy, right? Wait until you give it a try.
Categories include: Box of Chocolates, Movies and Things, Famous Authors and Lyrical Lane.
Easy, Medium and Hard levels control the words presented per topic. Move the pieces by tapping on letter and then space or pushing them around. Get more points for getting the words on earlier tries!

name: War of Words 2
description: Get ready for the ultimate word battle! An exciting blend of turn-based strategy and crossword game, War of Words 2 pits you against up to 3 other players for an all-out word destruction brawl!

name: Word Strike
description:
What's the word we are looking for?
Each puzzle contains four words that are associated to the answer, can you figure it out?
For instance, what do Superhero, Joker, Robin and Alfred associate to? Or, can you figure out what Antarctica, Ice, Water and Titanic have in common?

name: Japanese Dungeon: Learn J-Word
description:
Are you still trying hard to memorize Japanese words?
Let's learn it in easy.

name: Guess the Celebrity
description: Are you interested in famous people? You’ve found the right game for you! Do you think you know celebrities better than others? Let's see if you can prove it!

name: Reveal! Multiplayer Edition
description: Reveal Multiplayer Edition is a turn based picture guessing game where you can play against friends or random opponents. It's fast, fun and super simple - just scratch the image and guess the answer! The less you reveal, the more points you earn!

name: Slice Words
description:
Slice Words is a fascinating mix of crossword and puzzle.
Choose from two game modes:
Restore a crossword puzzle from pieces of words using a clue, or test your knowledge of foreign words and learn new ones in Language Quiz

name: Word Pop: Endless Brain Game
description:
Challenge your vocabulary and speed with this awesome word game!
Find as many words as you can while you race against the clock. Every word you find earns you points and adds more time, while more letters are added to the grid. The longer the word, the more points you get!

name: Elevate: Brain Training
description:
Elevate is a brain training program designed to improve your mind’s focus, memory, speaking abilities, processing speed, math skills, and more. Each person is provided with a personalized training program that adjusts over time to maximize results.
The more you train with Elevate, the more you’ll improve critical cognitive skills that are proven to boost productivity, earning power, and self-confidence. 90%+ report improved vocabulary, math skills, and overall mental sharpness when they frequently use Elevate.

name: MaxWord
description: MaxWord is for busy word game lovers looking for a diversion when they have a few minutes between meetings, chores and appointments. Enter correct words with the letters provided to make them disappear before the grid fills up. This is a multi-level game and the user may choose to post their scores to our web site.

name: Wolf Game: Wild Animal Wars
description: Team up with wolves from all over the world to fight with other wild animals - to survive, explore, hunt, challenge, and revenge. As the Alpha of your wolf packs, you will lead your wolves to defend your den and rise to the top of the food chain in the wild!

name: TapKick 2014
description:
Join the Tapkick 2014 tournament ! - Simply tap when the ball is between the lines
See if you can keep the ball up longer than your friends !
The simple "tap" gameplay (famous from Flappy Bird) turns Tapkick 2014 into a game for everybody and all ages.
Pick your country from any of the 32 competing countries, and beat your friends high-scores and become the Tapkick 2014 king!

name: Timber Roller
description:
Test your skills in this funny fast paced arcade game where Timberman goes roller skating!
Roller-skate as far as you can! Jump over the river and get to the new world!
Ride across the suburbs, snowy winter streets, post-apocaliptic city, disco club, beach and the space station!
Unlock all the funny heroes including a pirate, baller, cop, ninja, knight and a princess!
Remember - in Timber Roller every tap changes skater movement direction!

name: Plumber Crack
description: Throw stuff at the traditional Plumber Crack under the kitchen sink. Or, go for the second most popular crack sighting: the IT Technician under your office desk. Plus we're adding new scenes all the time for you to hone your "crack" throwing skills.

name: Mad Freebording Snowboarding Free
description: Mad Freebording is a skating game featuring the new sport Freebording. It feels like snowboarding the streets. This game offers over 30 missions on 18 levels, large variety of clothes and items, realistic levels and pure fun. Ride, level up, improve your skills, customize your clothes and get involved with the world of freebording! This game is the successor of Freebord The Game.

name: Basketball Games!
description:
Dunk the ball through the hoop and aim for the perfect swish! Jump and rebounce from wall to wall up into the infinite sky.
Are you ready for this new challenge against time?

name: Odin's Adventures
description:
If you like games with cool design, great music and interesting gameplay, then game "Odin's adventures" is what you are looking for.
Immerse yourself in the relaxing world of Odin, admire the beauty of the Swiss Alps, but do not forget about obstacles on your way.
Help Odin, experienced extreme rider, to conquer the mountain. Go around the rocks, accelerate on the slopes, jump over pits, but watch out for tire wear.

name: Xmas Santa Mad Sleigh Run
description:
The fastest Santa Sleigh ride on earth! Slide down the mountain and avoid the trees!
X-mas Santa Mad Sleigh Run, is an easy to play arcade game.
Just drag your finger left and right to move Santa.
Watch-out for the Trees, Snowman and huge Candy Cane
as you slide down the mountain.
Start slow and build speed as you go down the mountain
until you get almost supersonic!
With one hand, one thumb controls, this game is
easy to play, fun to master!
If you're looking for free Christmas
fun games you've just found it!
Have fun this Christmas holiday season:
Get it now!

name: 80s Mania Wrestling
description: 80s Mania Wrestling is a totally radical pro wrestling booking and business simulator presented as a collectible card game, set in pop culture's greatest decade!

name: Olympic Games Jam Beijing 2022
description:
Welcome to the world’s biggest winter celebration! Olympic Games Jam: Beijing 2022 is a wild party game where up to 20 players compete in real-time through a series of chaotic mini-games until one champion emerges. Weave your way to the head of the pack in snowboard cross, pull insane tricks in slopestyle, and hog up all the power-ups in skeleton as you race to the top of the podium. From top hats to Yeti suits, customize your avatar to bring your unique style to the competition. Play to earn NFTs that can be traded for money on the nWayPlay Marketplace. Let the Olympic Games begin!
MAYHEM EN MASSE
It’s Olympic sports like you’ve never seen before. Connect and compete with up to 20 contestants from around the world in a series of randomized wild mini-games until only one player remains.
YOU DO YOU
While the competition may be stiff, at least look your best when you flop. Customize your avatar from astronaut helmets to hot dog suits to express your individuality and stand out from the pack.

name: Wrestle Champs
description:
Take control of a wrestler's career, from hiring, to training and of course watching them wrestle matches as they go from a green rookie to a seasoned veteran!
Collect move cards, training cards and create a deck of cards for each of your wrestlers!
Wrestle Champs is a unique community driven multiplayer game. Hire wrestlers, enter them into wrestling shows that happen at real times during the day and watch as they compete against other wrestlers from players all over the world!

name: Dylan the Driller
description:
Help Dylan build his city!
Dylan The Driller is a construction-based tower building game that is extremely addictive. Try to build the tallest building. Experiment with different tower shapes. Remember, the tower takes the shape of a construction that you make, which gives you the power to make unique buildings.
Place the buildings that you like in your city. Try making the coolest city possible. it would be pretty cool if the highest skyscraper was in your town!
Also, you get different accessories from the chest and from completing some achievements, you can combine those accessories to make some interesting outfits for Dylan.

name: Spellt
description: SPELLT is a daily word game. Find as many words as possible from a set of letters. A new puzzle comes out every day!

name: Lessen
description:
Special art work, you will never forget.
Stack stripes to make a beautiful rainbow shape when it lessening.

name: Rock on: A SongPop Adventure
description:
Crank up the volume and join the band - it’s time to ROCK ON! Quiz yourself on the best of Rock in this spin-off of SongPop, the award-winning music trivia game.
Embark on an adventure through the world of Rock ‘n’ Roll! Listen to clips of Rock hits and guess the correct artist or song. Shred your way through Classic Rock, Heavy Metal, Punk Rock, Pop Rock, Indie Rock, and more. Master each level and become a Rock Legend!

name: Trombone Hero
description:
Trombone Hero is the mobile trombone-based rhythm music game. Unlike most music games, you can freely play any note at any time. You're not just following along with the music, you're actually playing the music!
The better you play, the more points you earn!
Improvise and play whatever you want in freeplay mode!
Collect every song from the collection and become the true trombone champ!
Playable with just one finger!
Entertaining for all ages

name: SuperStar Loona
description:
When the moon rises in SuperStar, we will be led to resemble each other
Loona rises upon my hand with SuperStar
Meet SuperStar Loona now!
New song and new Theme Card of Loona, updated every week

name: Music Star: Life Simulator
description: Less than 1% of musicians make it on the path to super stardom! Start at the bottom of the music world and climb the ladder of fame as you create chart topping hits, negotiate record deals and create a musical legacy!

name: SuperStar: Oh My Girl
description:
You're invited to the rhythmic secret garden with Oh My Girl
Weekly Oh My Girl Song & Card Theme Update

name: Band Land
description:
How many bands can you name?
Find it out in the most comprehensive music bands trivia game in the app store!
Write the name of the pictured band to clear a level. Do it as fast as you can and earn high scores and earn Band land coins!
Stuck in a band you can't name? Use the coins to get valuable hints or ask your friends to aid you via Twitter or Facebook.
Levels are unlocked progressively, but don't forget to clear them completely in order to get all the achievements and the highest ranking in the GameCenter leaderboard!
Featuring more than 200 bands to guess divided in 10 levels of ascending difficulty: from the most popular classic to the most obscure title only true audiophiles will be able to identify!

name: Grows: Journey to the Sunshine
description:
There exists a journey,beautiful and colorful Scenes,Peaceful and quiet music, extremely interesting grows trip.
A seed,go through dark mud,pass hard and big stone,avoid the attack of all kinds of animal,finally,break the limit of mud and appear on the ground,all of which make your blood go fast in the vain.
There must be something make your heart beat faster,may be it is a piece of music,or may be a beautiful scene…

name: Woozzle Reborn
description: Woozzle is a puzzle game about finding the right path for crazy marbles. You have to be smart to understand the labyrinth of cross-roads and quickly set the right path for each color marble to its correct dock. This game brings a steady dose of fresh techniques and puzzles coming at you at all times. Tens of different obstacles and features allowed us to create amazing levels with many different mechanics and twists. Try Woozzle for free and buy full game later, no ads, no disruptions. Just pay once and play forever. We have plenty of new ideas and pile of new levels in the queue.

name: Pixel Pro Snow Fight
description:
The aim of Pixel Pro Snow Fight is to conquer a smorgasbord of enemy hideouts, collecting various medals as you go. To achieve this, players command an elite squad of snowball slinging warriors who must capture the enemy snowmen and flags.
Snow Fight provides a fun control system, combining drawing and taping. Players direct their commandos by drawing the path they would like them to take, then throwing snowballs at all-comers as they follow the path.

name: Halloween Run!
description: Strategically navigate your way through this minimalistic Halloween poster inspired game!

name: Round Space
description:
"Round Space" is a fresh and original sci-fi style arcade.
Warning: If you are not a good pilot, you may feel dizzy.
Flying around an damaged planet, collect stars and avoid obstacles.
Include endless mode and 100 levels mode.
When you are playing, you will get coins to unlock more fighters or continue games.

name: Chicobanana: Space Pong
description:
Play Pong with a monkey as ball!
One or two players, you can play together with your friend at your side on the same device. Chicobanana loves to play this crazy game!

name: Drum Beat Jump
description:
Do you have the reflexes to be a percussion master?
Find out now!
Drum Beat Jump is a music game, where you are rewarded for keeping
a steady beat.

name: Puzzle Gods
description:
Match and switch elements to level up, defeat Little Hades and rescue the gods in this mythic puzzler. The Land of Olympus needs you!
Little Hades has kidnapped the Puzzle Gods, and Little Zu is the only one who can save them. Join Little Zu in his quest to rescue his friends!

name: ReDrawn: The Tower
description:
A mysterious tower holds the secrets to untold power and the little girl who wields it. Iris is the key to your world’s future and can bring her art to life, but an unknown evil wants to keep her from her destiny. When she’s captured and trapped somewhere in the tower, only you can rescue her and save the kingdom in the process!
Can you traverse the worlds inside her paintings to reach her in time? Find out in this spell-binding Hidden-Object Puzzle adventure!

name: The Tower of Muuda
description:
Simple & speedy puzzles on the stage you saw in the past
A match-3 puzzle adventure where you fight with items!
Find hidden treasures and reach the top floor of the tower!
The second game that never crosses generations!

name: Fantasy Solitaire: Card Match
description: All Fantasy Solitaire puzzle and story content can be experienced without purchase. Ads are optional as part of a prize wheel (they are not in the rummy card puzzles game). Play our rummy and solitaire card puzzle game as much as fits your day!

name: Joggle: Word Puzzle
description:
Enjoy a word puzzle game unlike any other you have ever played.
You get a clue and a six-letter word. Solve the clue by changing two letters in the given word. You have 60 seconds.

name: Xmos
description:
Santa has an overload of things this year and needs your help to reduce them!
Combine three or more of any kind, and they will disintegrate. The longer you can keep up, the higher the score.

name: Charlotte's Table
description:
Welcome to Charlotte’s Table where you can create the restaurant of your dreams!
Choose your menu items and the look & feel of your restaurant. From interior design to table settings to food plating, Charlotte’s Table offers many choices to create both a lavish and welcoming restaurant for you to call your very own.

name: Ancient Demons
description: Collect elements to attack your demonic foe or increase your own energy. Collect spirit rings to assist in your plight. But beware of demonic pentagrams causing destruction. Prove your abilities on Game Center. Success is not guaranteed.

name: Hi Guess the Movie 2016
description:
Watch the pic and guess the movie out!
Thousands of movie puzzles available. The hottest 2016 charts added.

name: Quiz Movie!
description:
Do you love movies? If so, you’ve found the right game for you! Think
you're a true movie expert and can guess any popular movie without
effort?

name: Don't Step White Tile: It's Me!
description:
Don't Step White Tile - It's Me is the most popular leisure and entertainment game,which can test your speed and accuracy!
Playing is simple, but the process is very exciting. Come and experience it!
step, step, step ......

name: Pictables
description:
Pictables is a unique Picture Pronunciation Word Game.
For each puzzle, a series of images are presented that help form a common phrase of one or more words.
Phrases include famous people, places, things, historical events, etc..
Players are awarded token points each time they correctly guess the phrase.
Players can spend their tokens to view the image sequences additional times or to see hints.

name: Kuma 2015
description: Survive four secret scenes to get the mysterious treasure! Complete all levels, and try to get three stars in each level!

name: Aircraft Flag Quiz
description: Aircraft Flag Quiz is a quiz-game that let's you test your worlds flags knowledge and your finger reflexes. Enjoy easy touch screen control. Learn, memory new flags every day.

name: Multiplication: The Game
description:
Are you tired of motivating your child to learn multiplication tables? Then let’s play Multiplication - the game!
In this game, multiplication tables are practiced and consolidated in a playful way. The high score hunt provides motivation to keep practicing.

name: Booblyc TD: Tower Last Defense
description: A guy fell asleep at the table, playing his favorite war strategy game on a smartphone. He dreams of an unusual dream that he gets just in the heart of td battles with orcs. The local empire warriors greet him, telling him that it would be nice if such a mage helped them in the castle siege. And now you can't tell the difference between the dream and reality...

name: Chain Letter
description:
Daily Word - Everyday A nine letter word is waiting to be unscrambled, use the hint, solve the puzzle. Come back everyday to play a new word and build up your streak.
Alphabet grid - Want to learn the mechanics, or simply pass the time? put the alphabet in the order within the time limit, play as much as you like and build your streak.
Take on the four by four and five by five alphabet grids, more letters, more moves, not enough time, how fast can you put the grid in order?

name: Emojly: Emoji Logic Puzzles
description: The task is simple: Solve the emoji wordle combo in 5 tries or less. Each combo has 3, 4 or 5 emojis.

name: Experdle: For Word Experts
description: Experdle is a great challenge for everyone!

name: Letterary
description:
Letterary is a contemporary word search.
Find the hidden nine-letter word by sliding from letter to letter.
The finished word will always form a 3x3 square.
For a tip, check the clue or opt to reveal letters.
On the results screen, tap a word to revisit its clue or see the definition, or share a digest of your solves.

name: Letter Pick
description: Choose your letters to create the best word possible. Letters are scrambled differently each day. Easily compare your score to those of your friends.

name: Hex Words: Word Search
description:
Whether you’re a crossword contestant or just an active anagram athlete, Hex Words will help you fill your day with more word finding fun!
Why find only a handful of words when you can find them all? Compete in the Daily puzzle to see where you rank amongst word-wise users worldwide.
Or if competition isn’t your cup of coffee, try Adventure mode! Each puzzle hides 6 related words, and it’s your challenge to find them. There’s only 19 letters on the board, how hard can it be?

name: Eat Your Words: Word Puzzles
description: Those of us who enjoy Sunday mornings with a hot tea and the crossword section know that there is nothing quite like a great word game. The combination of racking our brains because we “know this one” and the sweet satisfaction of finally solving the puzzle warms us to the core. We word game lovers are a special group of word-aholics and Eat You Words is here to give you your fix!

name: Septourian
description:
Septourian is a retro styled RPG with procedurally generated content.
Embark on an epic quest through the sprawling lands of Septouria to discover its secrets.

name: NBA Clash
description: Introducing NBA Clash, the fast-paced head-to-head game that will have you hooked on basketball like never before! School your opponents with quick drives to the basket, long-range 3-pointers, and explosive dunks. As you climb the leaderboards, unlock new NBA Stars to add to your ideal team. Set your lineup and execute the best strategy to dominate the competition and become the ultimate NBA Clash champion!

name: Madfut 23
description: Welcome to the new '23 season, with more amazing content and modes than ever before!

name: Twin Kickers
description:
It's a game where you kick all the balls like crazy.
There are two kickers who kick the ball, but it is not easy because the ball is fast.
Moreover, the more the game progresses, the more balls there are, and the speed of the balls increases.

name: Rope Apple Golf
description:
It's a new golf game where you hit the target.
Of course, it also includes the traditional way of putting the ball into the hole.
It is not easy to hit a moving target.

name: Golf knight
description: Play through various mysterious lands, Ice Mountains, and the hidden caves, and unravel their hidden secrets!

name: Rope Basketball
description:
This game is for those who want to throw the ball endlessly into the basketball hoop.
If you score 31 goals in a row, you can move to the next level.
Let's go to the new world of basketball.

name: Snake Champions
description: A fresh take on the classic snake game of the 90s. Hone your skills and play against players around the globe to win real money/prizes or just play for fun. Eat the same type of fruit consecutively to score big combo bonus points, collect power ups and unlock all playable snake characters. Powered by the Skillz multiplayer eSports platform ensuring fair skill based competition with features such as leaderboards, tournaments, trophies and a loyalty program which rewards you just for playing. Embrace your inner competitive self and become a Snake Champion!

name: Scream Barbellman
description: Use voice to lifting barbell , gradually it will be play difficult for you , an obstacle appears , you need to lift the bar by miss obstacles.

name: Soccer Cup: World League
description:
Equip with the latest soccer AI moves, this is the ultimate soccer game. The Arena is designed with HD graphics and an enthusiastic crowd. Enjoy the ultimate 11 player soccer simulation.
Soccer fever is high! Do you love soccer? Then this is the game for you! Download this game and polish your inner champion.

name: Glitch
description:
Its probably supposed to be like that. Maybe.
Yes, Glitch looks a lot like Pong. Its supposed to. It doesn't play much like it, however. Glitch takes common bugs made in game development and makes it the point of the game.
Or, maybe the point is to just sit across from someone see how long you can play, despite the Glitches.

name: 66 Balls
description:
"66 Balls" is mini physical game.
Shoot color balls to cups to get scores.
"66 Balls" has lots of tracks.Time is the key!
It looks like easy, but if you don't control the time, you can't be god!

name: Drum Girl
description: Sin descripción

name: Pipe Dreams
description: This one goes out to the lovers, the believers and the pipe dreamers. All we want is a place that we can be free and live up to our full potential; be something better than ourselves. ‘Pipe Dreams’ is the game where you can power up to the rank of believer and reminisce in the past that never was. Perform space flips in the imagined world of self belief, hang around for a second in the Joy Shop of life, in times that never were. It’s the way of life in a made up fantasy, that we all wanted, but never got.

name: iMimic: 80's Vintage Electronic Memory Game
description:
The 80's are back! And your memory will be challenged by this retro-style electronic game*. Repeat the sequence of tones and lights played by iMimic - it starts with a single tone and every round the sequence gets one tone longer
The faster you tap the sequence, the higher you score. Climb up the leaderboards. Collect all achievements.

name: Tap Tap Ants
description: Sin descripción

name: Tiny Fat Hero
description: Tiny Fat Hero is here to clean the city

name: Chip Beat Blaster
description:
Chip Beat Blaster is a rhythm platformer game featuring a world-class artist lineup. It's made by people who love rhythm games, chiptunes, and old school games.
Help Riff Radical save the world from evil catfish attorney Bill Johnson using the power of chip music and his homemade 'famiguitar.'
Chiptune music is electronic music made using the sound chips of vintage computers and video game consoles.

name: 99.99% 3D: Fill the Ball
description:
If you don't feel satisfy, you can unlock new world to torture yourself better.
As developer, when I try to pass level 1 in game world 10, I'm tortured deeply.I don't suggest players to try game world more than 5....

name: Not Match
description:
"Not Match" is a fresh original reflex game with deep malice.
One tap to switch blocks and NOT match them!
"Not Match" may break your heart, but you would like to suffer it.
If you start to challenge levels, don't to be scared at the begging.It may be easier in new levels, may be harder too.

name: Rainbow Infinity
description: Bend your fingers and set your hands on fire with this unique piano-like game about spheres and spikes! Master your own eye-hand coordination while feeling like the unknown great-grandchild of Mach or Bozart (two incredibly renowned 18th century Rainbow Infinity virtuosi).

name: Beet: Drum Machine Game
description:
Beet is the finger drumming game that puts your grooviness to the test.
Explore over 200 spicy beats designed by real producers.
Earn shiny stars to unlock new beats.

name: Dance Fever HD
description: Dance across 16 cool places around the world. Life is music… welcome to Dance Fever!

name: Caribbean Rhythms Lite
description:
Play your favorites songs in this amazing caribbean percussion kit.
Conga, timbal and bongo!
Real and cool sound, everything you need.
Enjoy!

name: Icewind Dale II: Collector's Edition
description:
This Collector's Edition of Icewind Dale II, in addition to the game, includes:

- A cloth map of the Spine of the World
- Dice
- A poster with a creature list
- Trading cards with characters and creatures from the game
- A bonus CD with in-game extras and soundtrack
- Spiral-bound manual
- Black Isle Studios stickers
- Writing tablet

name: Aestha: The runner game
description: Try Aesthar now! Explore magical worlds playing as the brave Kara and his mount Balkar, a magical rabbit that will help you overcome the most difficult obstacles that you will find along your adventure to defeat the evil Zelius. Aesthar stages will surprise you with its control system of the characters and incredible aesthetic. Aesthar features a soundtrack that will make you live a unique experience. Aesthar is the perfect game for your phone!

name: Survival Express
description:
"Surprise surprise!” - saboteur said and pushed the cart with a miner into deep cave darkness. Little he knew that exploring unreached areas will bring more fun than fear. There was no other choice for the miner than accept this upcoming challenge. The slight problem was that the railway seemed to end very soon… The good news is that it’s not the end of the story. Use your finger to build a safe track to continue this dangerous and dynamic journey. Avoid approaching rocks, collect gold and ride as long as you can keeping the miner alive. Super easy controls let you concentrate only on the gameplay action. Rail track follows your finger position on the screen. Simple as that!
Think fast, use your reflexes to react quickly and dive deep into cavern ride!..

name: Out of Brakes: Endless Racer
description:
Feel the Rush – Drive to Crash!
Out of Brakes is an arcade-style racing game with destructible environments, eye-catching graphics, and varied vehicles.
Out of Brakes offers a fresh gameplay mechanic that allows you to recapture the excitement you got from playing with toy cars when you were a kid.

name: Air Racer: Sky Traffic
description:
Air Racer is simple and interesting game. Overtake other racers in the sky traffic and earn scores. Collect stars and unlock new airplanes.
Simple one-tap control: Tap screen and hold to fly up, release to fly down.

name: Scroll Driver Lite
description:
Scroll Driver is a fun time-based vertical scroller driving game that makes use of the iPhone's accelerometer.
The object of the game is to navigate your car along a straight road that is littered with obstacles as fast as you can without crashing. There is a leader board, so your best times are stored.
This is my first iPhone game so the game play is quite simple. I am adding new features and game play based on comments and feed back from the community.

name: Evil Zombies: Death on the Road
description: This game is a real find for those who sometimes likes to just stare at screen and turn away from the bustle of the surrounding events. Here you do not need to think about strategy, tactics or their actions. Choose a car and go on the road crush evil zombies. In the end, in addition to adrenaline and money, you get a status that reflects your personal style.

name: DMBX 2: Mountain Bike and BMX
description: The game is featuring Mountain Bike and BMX action... completely new levels and characters... new and more bikes... completely new physics... easy trick-steering and much more! Start your virtual biking season right now and try DMBX 2 for FREE !

name: Stick City Run 2 By Lettu Games
description: Sin descripción

name: Dirt Racing 2 Sprint Car Game
description:
Experience the Speed, Drifting, and Fun of all-out arcade Sprint Car Racing 2!
This is not your usual old school top view racing game. Sprint Car Racing is fast paced, slide around corners just as they do in real life. Win sprint car coins to upgrade the Engine of your car, or even better purchase faster and better sprint cars. Sprint Car Racing fun to it's extreme!

name: Jumpy Road Race
description:
Survival on the Road. avoid obstacles and sink holes.
Match yourself with world racers
Instructions: Use the phone's acceleration to move the car, and Tap to jump.

name: Legendary Racing
description:
Legendary Racing is a racing 3D game for iOS device for FREE !!.
Learn the story of old glory racing from 60's to the modern world! Complete Career Mode and become a legend of Legendary Racing.

name: Rally Drifters Racing Cars 3D: Ultimate Fast Car Gang Challange
description:
Rally Drifters Racing is a drift based rally game and not a traffic racer. Drive with hill climb, asphalt drift, and real dirt drift. Rally with drift together. This category redefined with Rally Drifters Racing. Rally Drifters Racing introduces best realistic and stunning controls for a rally game. Have fun with drifty and realistic tuned physics with detailed graphics, vehicles and racing tracks. Be a rally racer, drive as Ken Blocks, and Collin McRae on the tracks not in the traffic.
Fasten your seat belt and take the control of your extremely Powerful Car!
You have mastered acceleration, braking and steering!

name: Orixo Hex
description:
Orixo Hex is here! If you like Orixo, you'll love Orixo Hex!
Similar to its predecessor, the goal is to fill all the empty hexagonal cells with the correct order of actions. As simple as it may seem, it can get quite challenging.
Discover an immersive puzzling experience through hundreds of hand-crafted levels and enjoy the relaxing soundtracks that accompanies you in your journey.

name: Car Factory Simulator
description:
Especially for fans of economic strategies, we made this game. An automobile factory is at your disposal. To be precise, you start with an empty factory and you will have to build it already.
It will be necessary to start with the installation of the first workshops - stamping and welding, where body parts will be manufactured. Next, the body will need to be assembled and painted. By the way, you can also choose the color of the car yourself.
At the same time, you will have to adjust the release of the suspension, as well as the motor. After that, in a special workshop, combine these components.
Next, you will need to install the seats and dashboard and check the build quality. That's all this and much more, the players will have to organize in their car factory.
We have been working on this game for a very long time and tried to do everything so that you like it.
We will gladly respond to your feedback and wishes. The game is constantly evolving and improving, including thanks to our players.

name: Coloring Animal Zoo Touch to Color Activity Coloring Book for Kids and Family Preschool Ultimate Edition
description:
Welcome to the Coloring Animal Zoo, where interacting with every page is easier than ever; simply touch to color! But that’s just the beginning!
Complete fun tasks like popping bubbles in the aquarium, chasing the parrot in the aviary and helping cute little birds clean the hippo’s teeth!
As you complete each page new things appear to color! Touch the barrel and monkeys pop out, Touch each monkey to put silly hats on their heads!

name: Pet Peaves Monsters
description: Three new spooky species have emerged...Battle them in an all new Haunted Hallow-arena! Then raise new pets and see if you can discover your own to keep!

name: Learn Colors Shapes Preschool Games for Kids Games
description: Teaches color identification and recognition by combining exciting card matching game play with professional narration, fun music and positive feedback. It's fun and easy for kids to use.

name: Animal Village Rescue
description: This game will spirit you away! The magical village is a mess and all of the cute creatures have disappeared. These little animals need your help!

name: Pet Paradise Story
description:
Pet Paradise Story is a funny and joyful game where you’ll travel through a match 3 puzzle adventure! Come join our cheerful doggie, grumpy cat and little guinea piggie for their exciting journey! Travel through the countryside, beach, farm and pets resort looking for tasty treats!
A joyful match 3 game for pet & animal lovers to make your day happier! Woof woof meow!
During the adventure are offerings of achievements, combos and power ups.
Switch and slide the board of delicious foods to create matches of 3 or more as you trigger combos and feed your beautiful pets yummy treats. Reward them with tinned meat, fish, milk, dog biscuit, vegetable and hay cube they love!
The game also has a lot of interesting power ups like magic bomb, magic shuffle and super pet power that will help on difficult levels. Come challenge your friends and invite them to enjoy the amazing FREE puzzle games!
Switch and slide the board of delicious foods to create matches of 3 or more as you trigger combos and feed your beautiful pets yummy treats. Reward them with tinned meat, fish, milk, dog biscuit, vegetable and hay cube they love!
The game also has a lot of interesting power ups like magic bomb, magic shuffle and super pet power that will help on difficult levels. Come challenge your friends and invite them to enjoy this amazing FREE puzzle game!

name: Cats Are Jerks
description:
Want to swat birds out of the sky? Of course you do. Cause you're a cat. And cats are jerks.
Tap once to jump into the air. While in the air, tap again to punch birds right in the face! Avoid the Jetpack Dog or he'll punch YOU in the face. Cause sometimes dogs are jerks too.

name: Monster Sweetie
description:
Monster Sweetie is a cute 3D monster collecting RPG.
Various game scenes

name: Find the Differences Detective
description:
The Classic Find the differences now in digital format with funny images
Fun for everybody

name: Aerial Austen
description: What was the weapon of choice in Jane Austen's time? Gossip. Tap tap tap to rise above, while avoiding the whispering windbags and prattle of mindless babblers in this Copter game parody. Tap to change direction as you fly up through weathered beams and talking heads. Help Jane Austen ascend to a new high score, but be careful, life is much harder than it looks!

name: Pocket Farm
description:
Pocket Farm is the farming game you have all been waiting for on the iPhone! Unlike other farming games this one doesn't require you to buy additional points or virtual items after you've already paid for the game! Pocket Farm is not a clone, it's a unique experience you won't find in other farming games.
Now you can build your farms wherever you go! Pocket Farm is a casual sandbox game that lets you build farms at your own pace and sell your harvest in a fun mini-game.
With only a shovel and a handful of seeds, build your farm from the ground up into a money making business. Buy fields, fences, a barn, tractor, pond, and a variety of animals. Place them where you want to design your farm the way you like it. Water the crops from your pond, or use a tractor to plow all the fields at once.
When you've harvested enough vegetables that are in demand, head to the market where you'll have to pack customer's baskets with vegetables without letting them fall off the conveyor belt. Fill adjacent baskets to chain them together and collect bonus multipliers to earn the most cash!
This extremely addicting combination of harvesting and selling will keep your fingers moving and brain entertained!

name: Cannon Basket HD
description:
Cannon Basket provides you a unique game play where you need to control the cannon direction with the help of your finger.
To the power release the touch and try harder to score more in the basket.
The interesting part of the game is that the basket will change its position at every level and becomes harder & harder to score more...! You have to shot the maximum of 25 levels of the game to become a Cannon Master and unlock Free Throws Mode!

name: Math City HD
description:
This unique game gives children the freedom to study
without stress. It equips pupils with logical reasoning,
problem-solving skills, and the ability to think in
abstract ways.

name: Donut Maker
description:
Tie on your apron and come fry up some warm, delicious donuts! Roll up your sleeves and join in on the greasy and messy fun! The original developers of the 'MAKER' series bring you Donut Maker!
First, mix the donut dough ingredients. After the dough is thoroughly mixed, roll it out using the rolling pin. Then, use the donut cutter to cut out each individual donut. Now, place each donut in the fryer until it is golden brown. Be careful not to forget about them or they will disappear in the grease!
Once the donuts are done to perfection, you get to decorate them! There are several categories to choose from so your donuts have just the right amount of icing and sprinkles! The decorating categories are:
- Plates: Choose from a variety of fun plates to place your yummy donut on!
- Icing: Select your base icing from an array of cute colors!
- Paint on Icing: Find a contrasting icing color to paint on your own creative design!
- Icing decorations: Select fun icing swirls and designs to add to your donuts!
- Icing accents: Add some stars, dots, and loop-de-loops!
- Candies and nuts: Sprinkle on fun colored candies! There are even cute holiday ones!
Finally, it’s time to eat your donut… or two… or three!
Post it on Facebook or email it to a friend!
Or, save it in the fridge to show off or eat later!
For more fun, be sure to try your hand at Chop Shop and test your chopping skills or take the food challenge and see how many cupcakes you can eat in 30 seconds!
Donut Maker is brought to you by the inventors of the MAKER series of games. If you enjoy our games, tell your friends, and write a review! Enjoy!

name: Space Rockets: Spaceship Rocket Simulator
description:
Isn’t it everyone’s dream to dive into space? Get ready for the ignition and have fun exploring the universe in this spacial adventure with fun and challenging missions!
Brave the unusual terrains of Artiska, Platunia, Vulkar and Wentura in your daring journey and try to land with perfection on the most uninviting places.
Solve the levels in multiple ways with your own strategy, but watch out for obstacles and be careful not to run out of fuel.
Collect the bonus star of every level to get even more points. Attaboy!

name: Dr. Dino -Doctor & Dentist games for boys girls
description:
Play with Dino Hospital, be a doctor! Kids can do: Fill teeth, Check Vision & Colorblind, Injection, X-rays and joint broken bones, Check-up, and etc. Dr. Dino includes 8 department: Trauma & Emergency, Orthopedics, Dentistry, Ophthalmology, Otolaryngology, Gastroenterology, Physical Examination and Ward. Every department contains several fun puzzles and mini-games. There are 28 puzzles & mini-games supply for your choice.
Hurry up, Doctor! Dino Hospital needs you! It's so fun and fantastic!

name: Super Bunnies Show Free
description:
These funny bunnies are tired of doing tricks for their tough magician just to obtain a measly handful of pellets. Bunnies love fresh veggies and dream of escaping to the countryside. Luckily, now they can count on you to help them run away from the magician's top hat.
During tonight's show, you will have to use all your talent to save as many bunnies as possible using the classic handkerchief trick and different types of trick cards that will distract the magician for a short time. But be careful, the magician will get angrier as more bunnies escape and things will get harder and harder.
After saving a nice herd of bunnies, you will have the chance to play with them in two super funny additional modes to win carrots that you can trade for trick cards.

name: 123 Kids Fun Connect the Dots Games for Smart Kids
description:
Join dots and see what is hidden under the mysteriously arranged digits! 123 Kids Fun Connect the Dots Games for Smart Kids - 60 pictures in 6 categories to choose for your toddler and preschooler!
123 Kids Fun Connect the Dots Games for Smart Kids is an incredibly charming connect-the-dots game which helps toddlers and children learn the names of dozen of objects, colors, insects and animals.
The gameplay is simple; connect the dots to reveal the hidden name and picture.

name: Ninja Ponk HD
description: Sin descripción

name: Triple Zoo
description:
Triple Zoo is a match 3 game combined with adorable animals to care for.
Beat all levels to build your zoo.
Collect all the animals and gold medals.

name: AR Flappy
description: Play Flappy bird in AR. Simply use your phone to view the space around you while you play.

name: Jewel Tycoon: Dig & Build
description: Sell created pieces at your shop to earn a fortune and expand to become real jewellery boss. Manage and customize you storefront to maximize profits and outperform the competition.

name: Burn: Multiplayer quiz game
description:
Bored of lockdown video calls and run out of conversation?
Ask questions > Write an answer > Vote for the best one.
Burn lets you throw shade at friends, test your general knowledge skills, and have fun in a more interesting way. Choose between the following modes for each round:

name: Word Tactics
description:
A real competitive online word game is finally available!
Discover the Word Tactics application, adaptation of the famous word game.
Practice in solo mode to warm up and then challenge other players around the world by creating or joining duels. Try to beat your opponents and take the top of the leaderboard to become the Word Tactics champion!
The object of the game is to find a word made up of a fixed number of letters. Well-placed letters are marked green, existing but misplaced letters are marked yellow.
Play as many word grids as possible in single player mode.
In multiplayer mode, you win the duel if you manage to find more words than your opponent.
Download the free Word Tactics app available on iPhones and iPads.
Accessible to all, the application will delight lovers of words, the French and English language and respect for spelling rules!

name: Word Peril Free
description:
Word Peril Free combines elements of multiple game genres and packs them into one addictive, fast-paced, and fun game.
Guess the puzzle (without going bankrupt) by using visual and textual cues from within the game. You begin with 00 virtual dollars. You are rewarded 0 for each correct guess. If you guess incorrectly, you'll put yourself in jeopardy by losing 0 for each missed letter. Successfully completing the mystery word or phrase nets you 0.
Use your Free Letter and Skip Puzzle tokens sparingly, as they are only refreshed upon reaching the next level.
Personal High Scores and Global High Scores (participation optional) are available so you can compete against yourself as well as the world!

name: Wordspie
description:
Love word games?
Wordspie is a game to make you adept at words.
Wordspie is an addictive word search game. The game presents to you 8 letters in each level. Keep forming words using those letters till you complete a level. You complete a level by earning points needed to complete the level in the provided time. You earn points by forming words having 3 or more letters. Each letter carries a point and the points you earn with a word is the sum of those individual letter points.
Improve your word search skills

name: Monsters have feelings too!
description:
Monsters have feelings too! is a single player word game with role playing game elements. Battle monsters with your words and spend their money on shiny hats.
There is a princess to be saved. She may or may not have a sexy elbow.
Woo her with your sesquipedalian arsenal. Go now, woo.

name: Scrabbled Eggs
description:
Scrabbled Eggs - It's a word game
Welcome to Scrabbled Eggs; a game all about making words - kind of like Scrabble - but on a vertical board... and against yourself... so not really like Scrabble. Maybe a little.

name: Word Life: Crossword puzzle
description:
Thousands of levels, three different game modes, and regular special events to play! Download Word Life for free and start training your brain today.
Your daily brain training is now called Word Life! Discover stunning landscapes while you sit back, relax, and play word puzzles.
Unveil hidden words by combining letters and learn new ones with the app's dictionary. Puzzles start easy, but get challenging fast! Do you feel like refreshing your French? In Word Life, you can have different progress paths in several languages.
If you feel like going for an extra challenge, you can try out the Multiplayer mode, in which you'll be able to outsmart your opponent. Keep your brain fit and bask in the beauty of nature with Word Life.
Embark on this beautiful journey and level up your mental agility while you progress.

name: Wordium
description:
Wordium is a free-to-play asynchronous, turn-based word game where players take turns building the highest-scoring words using adjacent letter tiles.
As players score a word, the used letter tiles disappear and new ones drop onto the board, resulting in a constantly moving, always surprising gameplay experience! Players compete for 10 rounds: high score wins!

name: Big Head: Guess Words & Head Charades
description:
Big Head! is an amazingly fast, fun and exciting multiplayer game for you and your best friends / family / colleagues!
Try to guess the word on the card that’s on your head based on your friends clues before the timer runs out and your head explodes :)

name: Wurds
description:
Wurds is a unique, varied and hugely enjoyable word puzzle game.
Not only are there literally hundreds of millions of unique FREE puzzles that you can play as much as you like. You can also create and share your own games for a truly endless experience.
Create enough words to fill the board from the letter tiles you are given before running out of time to advance through the levels and up the leaderboards. Play without time limits in laid-back mode or create a globe of words in word matrix games.
Each level is generated dynamically, so there are an almost limitless amount of levels to play. The words you have to find are not predefined either, so as long as you enter a real word that fits on the game board, you can play it.
Create your own custom games by defining a set of letters and words to find. Add a time limit, or not, and share it for any of your Wurds friends to play.
Optional, plural and singular word checking and automatic entry. Say goodbye to the tedious process of entering slightly altered words over and over again.
You can play the standard game, free forever. You never have to buy anything.

name: Hidden Objects Kids Room
description:
Are you ready for the latest hidden object game? If you're a fan of find hidden object games for kids, you're at the right place! Hidden Objects Playground is waiting for you! Spend hours of fun while playing this excellent find objects game! Hidden object games with colorful graphics and intuitive gameplay are the right choice for you! Enter the magical hidden object world and let the adventure begin. Crack the mystery by finding all the hidden items in wonderful pictures! Search and find hidden things in beautifully designed playgrounds. No matter if you're a kid or you're an adult – this awesome hidden object game 2018 will take your breath away! Start playing today, reveal the mystery object and find it in the pictures!
1000+ objects!
Magnificent graphics!
Catchy sounds!
Hint system to help you!
Awesome zoom feature!
Hidden Objects Playground is a high quality puzzle game for all generations of players! If you're looking for seek and find hidden objects with puzzles, this awesome educational game is exactly what you need! Enter the magical mystery world of playgrounds and have tons of fun by playing hidden objects for kids! Download hidden object games and start playing today – these phenomenal find the missing objects games will help you revise your vocabulary or learn some new words and will also test your concentration! Hidden object with levels of the best design – for your entertainment only! Find hidden objects in pictures of cute playgrounds for kids – look for hidden toys, sunglasses, food, drinks, and other things in magnificent levels! If you're ready for a true hidden object adventure, buckle up for the best find objects experience ever! We guarantee that you'll spend good quality time playing this photo puzzle game! Enjoy!

name: Think About It!
description:
English:
Guess the word! You have two lifelines available: revealing third word, or letter from left side. Just think about it!
Polish:
Gra dostępna także w polskiej wersji! Zgadnij słowo. Masz dwa koła ratunkowe: odkrycie trzeciego słowa, lub litery z lewej strony.

name: Letter Bank: A Free Strategic Spelling Game
description:
Letter Bank is a free strategic multiplayer spelling game. Compete against your friends to control the alphabet! Strategy and patience will guide you to victory. Better get out a dictionary.
Not into competitive play? Letter Bank has 3 single player modes to practice your letter-fu... Each game mode has achievements to track your progress!

name: Starstruck

Jacky's drawings are colored black and white with a rare style and humor, each hiding an object, animal or a person which seems to be part of the drawing... but it isn't! Challenge your illusionary brain to see if you can find all the hidden objects on each level.
The game is nothing like the classic "hidden object" games that you already know - download to discover special gameplay, story, art, and design which makes it a truly unique and original brain teasers puzzle game unlike any other.
The game's concept is simple and lovely and suits all ages - from kids to adults alike. But don’t let this fool you, “Jacky’s Hidden Items“ will require you to solve challenging mind teasing levels in a clever and rewarding experience as you’ve never encountered before.

name: Where is Ploppy?
description: Where is Ploppy?, a colorful fun hidden object game for everyone, is designed with your child's safety in mind. In addition to Apple's guidelines for children's games, we go one step further and firmly believe that any data about your children belongs exclusively to you and your children and should stay that way. Therefore, Where is Ploppy? does not store any of your children's data! There are additional security mechanisms in place to prevent your child from being routed out of the app while playing. This means that as soon as a link is called up, such as to rate the game, a short math problem must be solved beforehand. Furthermore, the game is also designed for the colorblind and children who can't read yet.

name: Go Domino
description:
Go Domino! Our version of this classic game is simple, fun to play and it provide some of the most common rules & variations (see How-To screen or contact us via email for clarifications). You can play Draw or Block games, choose the target score (from 100 up to 500pts), scoring options (at end, all 5s, or all 3s), game start options (last winner, highest double, or heaviest domino), and opening spinner options (no spinner for 2 trails or first spinner only for up to 4 trails).
Go Domino has tons of cool features including a full view of domino trail, Drag and Drop dominoes to the table (1 finger gesture, just touch the domino and drag it to the available position on the board), game log, zoom in/out, stats box and more features and variations to come in future releases.
Play the game against 1, 2, or up to 3 virtual players at a time. There are a total of 9 different virtual players, and each one of them has its own expertise level (Beginners, Intermediate and Advanced). Go ahead and play against all of them.
Customize the game by selecting the table (or theme) of your choice. There are 12 different options including marble tables, wood tables, bamboo, classic game tables, and an outdoor concrete table. Also, you can select the style of domino to play with from 3 options white, colored dots or black.

Tripeaks (sometimes known as Tri Towers or Tri-Peaks Solitaire) is an original card game with simple rules. All you must do is match cards that are one higher or lower than the card in your hand. An Ace is both high and low, and you place a 2 or King on it. The longer the run the better. Use the free wildcard for when things get a little too tough. If you can’t find a match, just turn over another card from the deck and continue! To win remove all three peaks of cards.

name: Cribbage Live
description:
Play cribbage and chat online with real players - hundreds of players from all over the world at all hours!
High quality and easy-to-use cribbage board, cards and fast play.
Cribbage Live is a social gaming platform where cribbage players from all corners of the planet come together to play this popular board game.
Cribbage Live features one-on-one cribbage games, multiplayer cribbage tournaments and multiple game variations.
Cribbage Live supports tournaments from both GameColony.com and cribbage.org ACC (American Cribbage Congress)
If you had an internet disconnection, Cribbage Live will reconnect you. Cribbage Live will play fine with either WIFI or 3G connection.
Six Card Cribbage is a two-player game of skill that uses a standard 52 card pack. The goal is to be the first to score 121 points over several deals. Points are scored for card combinations that occur during the play or in a player's hand or in the crib -- the cards discarded before the play.
Five Card Cribbage variation is an older traditional version that is still popular in England. 5 card Cribbage differs from the more modern 6 card cribbage by the number of cards in hand (initially 5) and by the score to play - usually it is played to 61 points.
Paul Rice of Wells, ME who plays in US national cribbage tournaments says that in cribbage "75 percent or more" depends on the skill of the player. Per Paul Rice: "in cribbage, every card you play and every card your opponent plays, you're trying to throw a curve ball in there"... "you can be dealt a gosh-awful hand and if you play it right, you can advance up the board."
Cribbage Live uses a fast cribbage central server supporting different cribbage clients in addition to iOS-based cribbage client.

As a lone indie developer, I strive for perfection in my games. If you encounter any bugs, experience any difficulties or have any suggestions on how to improve Yacht Dice Games, please contact me directly at

name: Ancient Games Of Nations: The Royal Game Of Ur
description:
The Royal Game of Ur is a 5000-year old Mesopotamian strategy board game which is wonderfully easy to learn. Download free for iPad the high-quality reconstruction of a game board from 2600 B.C., found in the Royal Tombs of Ur (Mesopotamia). You can play in single- or local two-player mode on a single device, at the difficulty level of your choice from beginner to advanced. This is the first piece in the AGON – Ancient Games of Nations series, a collection of amazing traditional board games for iPad.
About the history of The Royal Game of Ur:
In the 1920s, British Museum’s archaeologist Sir Leonard Wooley (1880-1960) found two of these game boards in the city of Ur. There is evidence that The Royal Game of Ur was the most popular game of the era. It is a typical race game, the ancestor of the genre. The rules applied in this iPad reconstruction are based on a cuneiform tablet from the 2nd century.
The framework application that comes with AGON - Ancient Games Of Nations is a virtual box which has twelve compartments to accommodate further board games. These will be made available one by one by Private Moon Studios. All AGON board games purchased will automatically integrate in the collection. The series will include various game types from all over the world: ancient Mesopotamia, Egypt, Japan, Korea and many more.
