Experience the thrill of Vegas-style social casino slot machines. Vegas Slots invites you to play the world’s favorite slot games from the world’s best social casinos.

name: Slots Pharaoh's Way Casino App
description:
Fun, excitement and entertainment! Welcome to Slots - Pharaoh's Way!
These slots play just like a dream - Easy to understand, big wins and amazing bonuses!
Gorgeous graphics, smooth animations, fantastic bonuses and atmospherical sounds guarantee a premium slot experience.

name: Slots Frenzy
description:
Brand new from the makers of the Jewel Frenzy comes Slots Frenzy, a great way to enjoy Vegas style slots on your mobile!
A simple interface means you can start playing in seconds. Just tap to SPIN!
Enjoy tons of different slot machine themes: Farm Village, Fairy World, Dragon Ville, Rome City, Monster World, Arabian Night, Wild West, Basketball and many more…

name: Poker Kingdom
description:
Welcome to addictive new Poker game.
Poker Kingdom is a collection of Poker games offering the newest redefined poker games, which is fun and challenging. The first available game is Chinese Poker. It is simple and surprisingly addictive. This game is suitable for all gamers. Try it and you can't put it down! It's the best time-killing when waiting in the line.

name: Animalz Pop-em
description:
Animalz Pop-em is a fun, engaging, challenging and easy to learn puzzle game.
Play with friends or compete online!
Animalz Pop-em is powered by Skillz to give you a fun and unique multiplayer experience!
Play for fun! Test your skills against people from around the world to climb up the leaderboard.

name: Vegas Casino Slots Mania
description:
Bigger payouts! Bigger bonuses! Bigger wins!
Play Vegas Casino Slots Mania on your iPad, iPhone and iPod Touch.
Fun themes to play

name: Card Games: Solitaire and more
description:
Do you like playing cards for fun or do you enjoy a tough competition?
Card Games is a collection of games played with one (or two) deck(s) of cards that meets both needs.
Relax while you play
Solitaire,
Freecell or
Pyramid (a Solitaire like game).
Join a table, and compete against other players on
Koltsina and Xeri game

name: Crazy Pirate Slots
description: ARR! It's one part Slot Machine and one part Shoot-Em-Up! Tap the skulls to take their gold, but careful matey too slow with your musket and they’ll steal some of yours! Spin and blast your way to the treasure chests for ‘Bonus Booty’!

name: New Ludo
description: Ludo is one of the most popular dice board games in many counties. This New Ludo, support "Team Mode" creatively, you can play together with friends in one team against others in another team. Also you can 1 vs 3 if you like!

name: Banzai Dice
description:
BanzaiDice is a fun little puzzle game that is easy to pick up but hard to master. Beginners will find the controls very intuitive and the game easily accessible but advanced players will still have their strategic planning abilities challenged!
To get started, simply slide the dice up from the row below so that they form "strings" - sequences of dice of consecutive values or sequences of the same die face. The more strings you can get in one move the higher your score will be! Simple, yet dangerously addictive!

name: Dice Fight
description: 3D graphics, online multiplayer, intuitive controls, and spells and charms lead you on an exciting journey through the ancient orient! Get it now to enjoy the classic fun of throwing the dice with a hi-tech touch!

name: New FreeCell Solitaire HD
description: FreeCell is one of the popular solitaire games that requires skill and patience to win! This is a card game with amazing graphics and ease of use to bring you the best experience.

name: Vegas Royal Jackpot CSS
description:
Spin the best free slots games, compete in leagues, join clubs and hit Jackpot.
In our huuge casino. Spin Slot machines and win Huuuge Jackpot starting with a welcome bonus of 5,000 In-Game Coins! What are you waiting for? All Hail the New Las Vegas Casino Game Ultimate Experience! Vegas Royal Jackpot Party Casino is here to fulfill your Wild Dreams, Winner at Billionaire Casino!

name: Up All Knight
description: Utilize the unique size manipulation abilities of the knights of UPtara to scale the castle, avoid deadly obstacles, and rescue the damsels.

name: Match & Merge
description: Match & Merge is an addictive puzzle game in which you match 3 or more blocks with the same color and number, and merge them into higher numbers.

name: Puzzle Journey: Match 3 Blast
description:
Our heroes Aary, Fizzi, Garin, and Skuik find themselves locked in a hidden lab where their wonderful and mysterious adventure is about to begin.
Engage in a dynamic and colorful puzzle game, use special techniques and abilities, like gravity distortion, to clear all bubbles. Help our heroes solve the secrets of the delicious fruit juice and reveal the real purpose of the Big Machine.
Get challenged in an amazing world of over 150 handcrafted levels giving you the chance to extend your smart play with the use of the unique Super Sonic Bubble Powers. Extraordinary laboratory environments, heroes with special super powers, lots of sweet colorful bubbles full of delicious and mysterious fruit juice.

name: Monopong
description:
Monopong is a minimalist arcade game a bit like that one with the ball and the paddles, but just for you.
Test your reactions with global leaderboards, and achievements throughout the game.

name: Supermarket Cashier
description:
Supermarket simulator is fun supermarket Cashier management game.
Supermarket simulator game has plenty of stores, cash register, fruits, vegetables, grocery department, fun zone, food zone, refreshment area and much more!
Become a manager of market and sell product of all the departments like local village market.

name: Econia: Crypto Idle Tycoon!
description:
Earn crypto in the NFT P2E game. Get tokens and sell them on the market
Tired of boring city simulators with monotonous gameplay? Econia is a mix of the best mechanics and genres: clicker, farm, idle, tycoon, city builder with resource crafting and quests!
Welcome to Econia: build the city of your dreams! This is a well-thought-out city business simulator for the construction and development of your metropolis. You can play alone or build huge cities together with other players - the choice of play style is up to you!
Use the most innovative economic strategies to become the market leader and overtake other players. Econia will surprise you and give you a unique gameplay that is definitely not found in other city sims, city simulators, idle, city tycoon games and clickers!
Econia: build the city of your dreams has everything you love in idle tycoon games: city building, economic and business simulator with a well-thought-out quest and trade system, farm mechanics and resource gathering.

name: Cat Tiles: Matching Puzzle
description:
Welcome to Cat Tiles! Get calm in a super relaxing match-3 puzzle game experience!
Unwind yourself by dressing up and interacting with cute kittens!
Decorate rooms to create a chill-out space for relaxation!
An endless array of new cats to meet and new rooms to explore!
Cat Tiles features relaxing match 3 puzzle, combined with the fun of playing with cats and room decorating.

name: Chess Minis
description:
Chess Minis has launched World Wide! Solve fun handcrafted puzzles or play online and collect 3D Chess sets designed by amazing artists. Play completely free with NO ADS!
Play free with no ads interrupting you, ever!
Play puzzles that are full of tricky, but elegant solutions. From beginner to expert, play to learn, train for just for fun!

name: Beyond Chess
description:
Chess has evolved! Welcome to Beyond Chess, the sequel to chess! Move a piece, then shift a square. The board is now an active part of the game! It truly is the natural evolution of chess!
Take your chess skills to the next level and renew your passion, whether you’re a casual player or a grandmaster. Whatever your experience, Beyond Chess will be the most exciting and challenging game of chess you’ll ever play!
Build your own board design or choose from a growing library of 180+ designs! Then play friends or compete against players worldwide to see who is truly the greatest chess player in the world! Each board layout offers all new chess challenges to explore. Countless possibilities. Endless fun. It’s the universe of chess in your hands!

name: Sudoku Portal
description:
the objective of sudoku is to fill a 9 × 9 grid with digits so that each column, each row, and each of the nine 3 × 3 subgrids that compose the grid contain all of the digits from 1 to 9. The puzzle setter provides a partially completed grid, which for a well-posed puzzle has a single solution.
are you looking to solve some interesting sudoku look no more, enjoy solving exciting sudoku in a beautiful and relaxing environment where the Portal takes you to the highest pikes of sea cliffs and the coldest regions of the pole where Eskimos live build igloos, and rest their wooden sleds and the silent of desert canyon where you enjoy the base campfire and a full moon and wonderful waterfalls?

name: Tap Bingo
description: BINGO game with your family during family nights, or with your friends or co-workers during a party setting. Spend the whole afternoon with your buddies, or even by yourself while competing with virtual players and earn virtual coins!

name: Mahjong Solitaire
description:
Enjoy hundreds of tile-matching puzzles. Equip themes and backgrounds, including "Stranger Things" ones, to change the game's look and feel.
Simple but never easy, the game challenges players to match tiles to remove them from the board. Clear all the tiles and you win!

name: Kids Jigsaw Puzzles: Fun Games for Girls & Boys
description: Jigsaw puzzle is a simple exciting game which millions of kids and grown-ups all round the world enjoy.

name: Tip & Tumble
description:
An extended collection of tilt mazes from Andrea Gilbert, the original clickmazes designer. Includes three variations with different goals.
Think you’ve seen it before? Think again! Tip the grid to start the balls rolling. Once tipped, stays tipped, until all balls are at rest. No dexterity required, just forward planning and logical thinking. Find the right sequence of tips to solve the puzzle.

name: Ones!
description:
A very simple rule, but once you start the game, it's hard to stop.
You will be addicted to play this game before you know it.

name: Push IT: Sokoban Puzzle
description:
Push IT is a Sokoban style puzzle game. Your goal is to push all boxes to the target area.
Currently it has 100 levels!

name: Mahjong Lonely Island: Majong Star Tower Deluxe
description:
Mahjong - your task is to clear the board by removing a pair of identical tiles. This game is familiar to all, but not all are as interesting as this one! Here you will be able to go through many levels, that don’t seem to you very boring and simple. If you run out of moves, you can move all the tiles. Those who loves more beautiful color can change the background. There are also some tips.
Disassemble the pyramid and have a lot of fun!

name: SailCraft GO
description:
Fully upgraded from the global feature winning "SailCraft," simulating the classic Battleship board game. Battle enemies under the fog of war, detect their position in advance, and eliminate their fleet at one stroke! SailCraft GO!
The all-age casual game that allows you to find new joy with families and friends. Classic Battleship and Attrition Battle modes. Match with players from all around the world anytime, anywhere. Intense and exciting PVP ladder league. Come find me at the Poseidon tier!
Brand new Sailing Road story mode and Siege Breakthrough instance. Challenge Sharkmen, Vikings, Skeleton Lord, Valkyries, Zeus, and other powerful bosses in legends and become the king of the seven seas!
Don’t want to play alone? The glory of the guild is calling you! Upgrade the Guild Frigate, compete in the Guild War, collect treasures in Exploration, conquer the sea with friends!
Please note! Downloading and installing "SailCraft GO" is free, while you can also purchase in-game items with real money. To cancel this feature, disable in-app purchases in Settings on your device.
In addition, this game requires an Internet connection.

name: Connect 4 Faces: Match & Play
description:
Connect 4 Faces is a fun modern version of the classic connect 4 game. It consists of two major parts:
1) A virtual world map as the matchmaking room: meet people from all around the world and find your perfect match. Exploring the match room is a lot of fun in itself. Fly around, collect some gems which you might need later in the game.
2) The actual connect 4 matches: To make this classic more exciting, you have limited time to complete your turn and you will loose health points if you missed it. Also, do not place your avatar offside, or you will loose more health points.
Be sure to delight your opponent player with some extra struggles. For instance you can create a game quake to make it difficult for him or her to exactly position his or her avatar. Or you can shorten the amount of time available for your opponent, shoot with baseballs, position turning windmills, hide your move or place a bomb to remove a threatening disc of your opponent. Some of the "attacks" (game quakes, time shortening) can even be defended.
After the match has finished you can send a message to your "opponent".
In the menu you can click "Recent Matches" - there you will find all matches you played in recent days. In this dialog you can "like" other players. That is, you can permanently see them in your "Liked Players" list and directly invite them to matches when they are online.
You can also check messages received form other players.
No game account needed. Just make sure that you have an iCloud account and that you have enabled iCloud Drive! No costs, no ads, no in-app purchases. Just fun playing. We hope you enjoy this game and we appreciate any feedback or thoughts you might have.

name: Angle Me
description:
The best free game ever to build your spatial, geometric, and tangram skills!
Fun and challenging for people of all ages!
Enjoy solving challenging puzzles by filling the board with a number of triangle shapes, fitting them together by form and colour.

name: Bearable - Return to Candyland
description: The Candyman and his tribe of merry elves have returned to the island of Bearadise, turning everyone - and everything into delicious treats! - Exclusive to the App Store

name: Gallag
description:
Remember the game, Galaga?
This game is not what it used to be
but try to keep the memory of classic games.
If you miss the nostalgia of the past, give it a try.
Simple control and intuitive interface, etc.
If you are first on it. You can get used to it easily,

name: PXL Play
description:
“PXL Play” is the first character you’ll meet in this adventurous endless runner. His happy bright color grabs your attention, and he’s hungry for pixel points. And more friends.
Continue your adventure with PXL, enjoying achievements and surprising boosts in this stress-free and colorful pixel world. The ability to shrink and grow, accelerate, earn more pixel points and expand your collection of playful characters is limitless.

name: Dracula City Master: Idle Army
description: Welcome to Dracula City Master - the ultimate idle horror tower defense game! Lead your own vampire army on a quest to conquer the world, expand your army with the tap of your finger and unleash hordes of hungry vampires into the world, with one goal - total domination!

name: Ram Setu: The Run
description:
Journey from one action packed situation to another, with star cast avatars inspired by the film Ram Setu, starring Akshay Kumar.
Ram Setu: Run - The Running game is a single and multiplayer non-stop action game. It’s a race in a quest to collect tokens, gems and power-ups, all while surviving the onslaught of enemy attacks, robotic drones, and wreckage.
Deal damage to enemies and escape the unpredictable as you ride, roll and jump, through this epic story deeply rooted in Indian culture and heritage.

name: Lillie is the Keeper
description:
You’ve always wanted a lighthouse of your very own.
Get up, find some open space, and step into a first-of-its-kind embodied AR experience.
The year is 1905. An uncanny catastrophe maroons Lillie Flora Pine in distant Switch Rock Light Station.
Where you go, Lillie goes - across the room, up the spiral stairs, or into the drink. Explore an atmospheric world between rolling seas and endless skies. Your iPhone or iPad is your controller. Examine objects. Operate machinery. Read logbooks. And try to ignore “Mrs. Noonday.”
Because Lillie is not an ordinary hero. Only 15, she suffers from intrusive thoughts. Now, they’re her only companion.
Because Lillie is the keeper.

name: Monthly Dystopia
description:
A dystopian survival experience inspired by George Orwell's 1984.
In Monthly Dystopia, you need to find a way to survive in an authoritarian world. You can serve the dictatorship by being a model citizen or you can try to flee the country by cooperating with the Resistance. You live under a regime in which love is forbidden and using words banned by the Party is punishable by death. Choose your words wisely if you don't want to commit a thought crime. Remember, there's always a screen watching you. The paycheck from your job at the ministry editing the past is barely enough to buy the food needed to keep you alive, so it is crucial that you find a way to flee this dystopia where even thinking is forbidden.
You can serve as a loyal citizen, fall in love and constantly fear getting caught, work with the Resistance against the dictatorship, and choose freedom or servitude.
The daily tasks you perform in your apartment are your only way to survive. Remember that your time is just as limited as your supplies. You'll have to choose between cooking before going to work, taking medication for your illness, or doing activities that benefit your mental state. You can try to protect the people around you by making conscientious decisions or you can escape this dystopia by sacrificing them.

name: Crush the Monsters: Cannon Game
description: Make mincemeat out of monsters! In this action puzzle game, you can destroy a variety of monsters in many different ways - blow them up with cannon fire, incinerate them, smash them, chop, saw or tear them to pieces (and that’s not nearly all!) And if regular monsters are too simple for your tastes, test your mettle against the epic bosses of the Underworld!

name: Legend of the Moon: Shooting
description:
You can play the game combining with other
devices Find the key to save the earth
by destroying entities posing a threat.

name: Bubble Bobble 2 classic
description:
Bubblun, Bobblun, Kululun, Cororon have been cursed by Superdrunk after reading the sealed book then turned to bubble dragon and trapped in the world of the book.
It is an action game that selecting one of 4 character with different ability by shooting bubbles to trap the enemy, then pop it with horns or scales to defeat them.

name: Evidence 111
description:
Close your eyes and play this thrilling detective audio game.
Are you a fan of detective stories? Do you like mysteries? Are you listening to audio books and podcast every day? Then this detective audio game is right for you!
September 13, 1985, a small town of Farnham, England. Just like every Friday, Chief inspector Alice Wells is on duty. An ordinary night shift is suddenly interrupted by a mysterious phone call - an anonymous caller knows something about the chief inspector that none was supposed to find out.
What will you do in this situation? What choices will you take? What mystery is hidden inside long-forgotten file containing Evidence 111? How the story of chief inspector Alice Wells ends is up to you.

name: Granny
description:
Many monsters and enemies in the city. Granny need to defeat them, this is a war, fight back and get treasures and save hostages.Earn more money to save town.Make granny become hero.
You can play everywhere ,every time. It is a boring killer game.

name: Light the Way: 10th Anniversary
description:
Originally released in 2012, Light the Way saw favorable success and ratings before being taken down in 2015. Now, for it's tenth anniversary, the game has been rebuilt from the ground up, sporting a fresh coat of paint and a handful of QOL improvements!
Light the Way brings a twist to the classic memory game genre! A sequence of tiles will light up across the playing grid. It is your job to memorize which tiles light up and the order that they light up in, then recreate said sequence. Sounds easy, but as you reach higher difficulties, the playing grid becomes larger and the sequences longer, testing how effective your memory truly is!

name: O-o-o
description:
The essential turning point strategy game!
Keep the board moving as you rotate discs to chain colors, connect corners and rack up high scores. Keep a level head under pressure as you clear as many lines as possible.
Earn perks to improve your chances, including Rewind giving you a second shot, Rainbow to chain with any color, and Bombs to clear out the board.
Combine perks and discover new tactics - drop a Rainbow and Rewind for better placement, or Rewind drop a Bomb? The choice is yours.
Thoughtfully designed with minimalist aesthetics and a rich ambient soundtrack, unwind while keeping your brain and body sharp.

name: Anno 1800: Dragon Garden Pack
description: Celebrate the New Year with the Dragon Garden Pack and create lucky dragon–themed districts with over 15 new ornaments.

name: Gherbert Groundhog in Save the Date
description:
Gherbert had just got his burrow laid out perfectly for his upcoming date with his sweetheart. Unfortunately his jealous crazy critter neighbours broke in and stole his belongings. With only hours to go until his big date Gherbert must venture outside to find his stuff and get back to tidy up before his date arrives at 8pm.

A traditional retro pixel art platform game. Collect the objects while avoiding the critters before the time runs out!

name: Hot Shots Golf 2
description:
Experience Hot Shots Golf 2 originally released on the PlayStation console, enhanced with up-rendering, rewind, quick save, and custom video filters.

Combining addictive gameplay and stunning visuals, Hot Shots Golf 2 delivers a comprehensive golfing experience, with a wacky sense of humour.

name: Lockdown Town ZX
description: Drive around Lockdown Town picking up patients and delivering them to the hospital for treatment while avoiding the nasty covidiots. Rinse and repeat! How many lives can you save!

name: GT-R Touring
description:
GT-R Touring is an arcade racing game featuring 36 cars, 28 circuits and head-to-head splitscreen multiplayer.

Developed by Kuju Entertainment and published by Midas Interactive Entertainment, released in Europe in 2006.

name: A Noite dos Patriotas
description: A Noite dos Patriotas is an indie game where you deal with patriots that want a federal intervention.

name: Alto Trek
description: Multiplayer game, developed for Xerox Alto, where each player uses their own Alto workstation to control a starship. The objective of the game is to destroy the enemy without being destroyed. A player can choose between of being a Klingon, Romulan, or Terran. The game can be played by one player, but there will be no enemy to destroy.

name: Cobalt Core
description: A sci-fi roguelike deckbuilder with a deep new single-axis spin on tactics games! Dodge missiles, line up your cannons, and blast 'em out of the sky... Then get to the bottom of these time loops, before it's too late!

name: Rocket Science
description: Take part in a space program. Design spacecrafts and send them off to explore the vast expanses of space. Experience the real scale of the Solar system and the size of its celestial bodies.

name: AbyssalCraft
description: AbyssalCraft is an eldritch horror mod for Minecraft centered around exploration, with growing magic and Lovecraftian influences.

name: Ultimate Sackboy
description: Play as Little Big Planet's iconic hero Sackboy as he takes on the legendary Ultimate Games, the most prestigious – and craziest – obstacle racing tournament in all of Craftworld! Can you surpass your rival, win the race, get cool prizes all while lookin' real stylish?! Or will you run into a wall and get totally wiped out?!

name: Actually Additions
description: Actually Additions is a mod for Minecraft that adds various new additions, including utilities, Crystal Flux machines, and foods.

name: Ruck
description: Reach to the top of the tower to get a strange golden artifact. But be careful, because the tower is filled with a lot of enemies and diferrents traps.

name: Green Sans
description: The first UNDERTALE fangame TO BE GOOD.

name: Marvel's Midnight Suns: The Good, The Bad, and The Undead
description:
Marvel's Midnight Suns: The Good, The Bad, and The Undead is the first DLC expansion for Marvel's Midnight Suns, released in January 2023. This expansion introduces Deadpool as a fully playable hero, bringing his trademark humour, unpredictability, and unique combat abilities to the game.

The DLC adds new story missions focused on Deadpool's involvement in the battle against Lilith and her demonic forces. These missions are designed to showcase Deadpool's quirky personality and chaotic fighting style, which includes regenerative healing and a mix of melee and ranged attacks.

name: A Passive Boy at the Huntress Clinic
description: The protagonist is unable to move due to a car accident and is now being approached by the heroines. And so begins a hospital stay surrounded by prank-loving female doctors and nurses!!

name: Meseugaki Yeong-ae-nim!
description: "Twenty questions party with Young-ae!"

name: The Sims 4: Simtimates Collection Kit
description: Set the mood with fun and flirty loungewear from The Sims 4 Simtimates Collection Kit.

name: The Sims 4: Bathroom Clutter Kit
description: Embrace the mess of daily life or create an organized oasis with The Sims 4 Bathroom Clutter Kit.

name: The Tongue of Doge
description: Play as a licking doge! Climb peaks with superb tongue skills! Pursue the hot cat! Get back on your feet after countless drops! Stick to your heart in ridicule! Will the final outcome be to embrace beauty or find the true self?

name: Train Sim World 3: ScotRail Express: Edinburgh - Glasgow Route
description: Rapid inter-city action in state-of-the-art traction awaits! Discover Scotland's two biggest cities and take charge of dense commuter services on ScotRail's principal rail line. The modern Class 385 is ready for service in Train Sim World 3: ScotRail Express: Edinburgh - Glasgow.

name: Way of the Wizard
description: Way of the Wizard is a first-person adventure game. Take on the role of a traveler who wants to become a wizard.

name: The Green Room Experiment: Episode 1
description: You're locked in a dream and you need to wake up. This game is designed on an escape game structure, you must solve a puzzle to move on to the next table. You will be transported to a dreamlike, strange universe, mixing exploration, mystery and poetry.

name: The Duduk Master
description: The Duduk Master, is a 2D platform game, with RPG elements that tells the story of a hero who was transformed into a monster, beside him are essential elemental skills to defeat his enemies and of course a powerful magic Duduk that can perform enchantments while playing some melodies.

name: Stack Machines
description: Push and pop your way through Stack Machines - an open-ended puzzle programming game. Use a variety of modules to read, transform and output different input sequences. Optimize your solutions for size, module count, speed and cost-effectiveness.

name: Rogue Blaster
description: Rogue Blaster is a shooting game that adds a twist to the FPS genre by adapting some rogue-lite aspects. The planet you crash-landed on is teeming with monsters! Use different equipment and items to survive the attacks until your ship is ready to leave.

name: Ozymandias: Mesoamerica
description:
Great cities have stood in these jungles and highlands since time immemorial. Upstart tribes threaten the old balance. Will the peoples of the Jaguar enjoy one last pre-columbian golden age?

Including a new map: Mesoamerica!

name: Sapiens League
description: Play for free and compare your skills with friends in this exciting competitive multiplayer game.

name: Old Shadow
description: A game based on J.R.R. Tolkien's novel The Lord of the Rings. A variant "Metroidvania" with elements of survival and crafting.

name: Medieval and Secrets
description: Medieval and Secrets - 3D, game, In which you observe the Middle Ages, look for precious objects

name: Martial Fire
description: Martial Fire is a classic 2D adventure game. Explore dungeons, ancient forests and deadly wastelands; fight enemies and solve riddles!

name: Light the Backrooms
description: You will be hounded by ghosts in the Backrooms of a ghost hunting company from midnight to 6 am. New kinds of crazy ghosts will be introduced daily, but you will also be notified how to deal with them. Take advantage of the two types of lights and survive five days of crazy business.

name: Kori's Fable Visual Novel
description: In a world of twisted magic and broken spirits be a girl with a mission.

name: Hyper Shapes
description: Hyper Shapes is a frenetic minimalist Boss Rush where understanding the enemies attack patterns and weaknesses is key.

name: Hike Trip
description: Take a step away from citylife and head on a rural Hike Trip in the middle of barely visited old forest.

name: Hentai Hanako
description: Hentai Hanako is a relaxing puzzle game. With the theme of hanako and 24 unique sexy girls. Enjoy sexy girls pictures and relaxing music to complete the puzzle.

name: Hell Slayer
description: Clear your way down to hell and bring punishment to the one responsible, Lucifer, fallen angel and king of sins. Face unending hordes of demons, optimize and perfect your build.

name: Castle Capture Topkapi
description: Multiplayer, medieval archery. Numerous characters, and classes to choose from. Use a bow or crossbow to snipe at your enemies or throw an axe for high damage. Use a sword, axe, hammer, mace, or fists for close combat. Exact copies of real-world castles, including Topkapi Palace.

name: Car Parking 2
description: Car Parking 2- Meet the continuation of the first part! Get behind the wheel of the same cars and get to the finish line in the shortest possible time!

name: Agent Roy: Zombie Hunt
description: Agent Roy: Zombie Hunt is an engaging 3rd person action shooter game. The horror is back. 300 Zombies. 15 houses. 1 village. Can Agent Roy face his worst nightmares and bring the nation to peace?

name: 8 Ball 3
description: Where to jump? Which way to go? Should I go on or fall? Which balloon to choose? Take your intuition to the extreme.

name: Cookie Match: Enhanced Edition
description: Cookie Match is a game that everyone can enjoy. To match cookies and cookie cutters or icings, you will face different tricks in each room, that gives you a unique experience and entertainment. Clear all the stages and reveal cookies' true stories!

name: Duelyst GG
description: Duelyst is a unique hybrid 1v1 card game where you play your units and spells onto a 9x5 board where you can position them to your advantage. You can pick from different generals with unique Bloodbound spells. All 800+ cards are unlocked so you can play anything you want from the start.

name: Desktopia: End of the Road
description: 'End of the Road' is a new game mode featuring a HUGE new level, five times longer than anything you've seen so far. Grow your village to an a massive 195 buildings, while dealing with multiple strongholds, new enemies, and new challenges.

name: Eastern Europe Bus Sim
description: Welcome in this bus simulator which brings you to Eastern Europe. Here, almost everything is different compared to the west, even the profession of a simple bus driver.

name: Enigma do Labirinto
description: Help the Abominable Cyclops of the snow solve the Enigma of the Labyrinth, so that he can be reunited with his beloved, who is waiting for him on the other side.

name: Frido
description: Robot time traveler got into the past. To get out, he needs to get to the time machine, passing more than 10 exciting levels.

name: GeoJelly
description: Born within unknown you instinctively seek for freedom as an experiment defect. In GeoJelly you have to find your way out of dystopian laboratory through platforming while avoiding traps and collecting keys necessary to push forward. Are you gonna find a way out?

name: Hank: Straightjacket
description: Hank: Straightjacket is a narrative bite-sized game combining traditional point-and-click gameplay with a time manipulation mechanic.

name: Gunwatch: Conflict Survival
description: 1-16 Player combat zone & 1-4 Player coop Zombie Wave Survival in Comic style. Singleplayer and Multiplayer Playthrough. Get ready for Gunwatch: Conflict Survival!

name: God Busters: Who watches the Watchers?
description: Episode 1: When fresh bodies start appearing from an explosion that happened weeks ago it's up to the "God Busters" to crack the mystery behind this case.

name: Arcade Archives: Tank Force
description: Tank Force is a 2D top down arcade game. It is a sequel to Battle City, with different graphic and various details, like bigger stages or new enemies. The player controls tank and must protect the base (with eagle). He must destroy all enemy tanks on screen. The tank cannot pass through water. All buildings are destroyable, but metal walls are invincible.

name: Chromosome Evil: Map Editor
description: Sin descripción

name: D-Paddle vs. Crankquet
description: A bespoke 2-player ping-pong game for the Playdate with D-pad controls for P1 and crank controls for P2.

name: Offroad Moto Bike
description: Enjoy riding your moto bike on off road terrains, trying to reach the goal line of each level. You will have to face loops, brigdes, hills, jumps and all sort of obstacles. More importantly, you will have to watch carefully you gazoline consumption to make sure you don't run out of it.

name: Japanese Escape Games: The Room with Sturdy Door
description: You wake up in a strange room. Solve the tricks and riddles and open the sturdy door. Can you escape from sturdy door?

name: Labyrinth of Galleria: The Moon Society - Great Boots Quest
description:
Unlocks a bonus quest. Once completed, you'll receive shoes as a reward.
The quest will appear under Request Memo once you unlock it.

name: Labyrinth of Galleria: The Moon Society - Great Hat Quest
description:
Unlocks a bonus quest. Once completed, you'll receive a helm as a reward.
The quest will appear under Request Memo once you unlock it.

name: Labyrinth of Galleria: The Moon Society - Special Soul Pact Quest
description:
Unlocks a bonus quest. Once completed, you'll receive a soul pact as a reward.
The quest will appear under Request Memo once you unlock it.

name: Sword Art Online: Alicization Lycoris - Blooming of Forget-me-not
description: Blooming of Forget-me-not is the first major expansion DLC for Sword Art Online Alicization Lycoris. Additional content includes a new story, weapons, outfits, and more.

name: Origin
description:
"Minimalist puzzling with a unique mechanic" ...Appzoom.com
"Origin ... leave your brain puzzled" ...Apppicker.com
"Solving Pretty Looking Puzzles".... nineoverten.com
Origin will tackle your brain in a different way than Brainsquare.
Easier to grasp, so it seems…
Rules are the same, link all pins of the same colors with their corresponding square tiles to solve each board.
Logic and ability to see forward is still required to complete the level.
Complete the levels in the number of moves allowed for each level, and share them on Facebook, especially if you manage to beat the minimum moves allowed.

name: Brain Box Quiz: Trivia Fun
description:
Brain Box Quiz: Trivia Fun is a fun comedy quiz game, starring the eponymous joke and pun cracking host.
You'll answer questions in seven trivia categories, testing your knowledge on entertainment, music, sport, general knowledge, history, geography and literature.
Quiz questions on Trivia Fun are full of jokes and laughs, and there's 100s to play! There's loads of questions about your most-loved movies, TV shows, music acts and sport stars.
You'll be laughing along to the (hopefully) funny jokes, and learning lots of new facts to bore... er... entertain your friends with.
You can play Trivia Fun against a Timer, or quiz in Zen mode for the times when you just want to chill out.
Do you want a hint about what I'm going to mention next? Yes, it's hints! Stumped by a trivia question? I suggest you take a hint and remove two of the possible quiz answers to make it a 50/50 chance - and those are great odds!
Want a fun character to use as your avatar? Who wouldn't?!? There's some fantastic characters to reflect the beautiful person, or werewolf, you are!
Here's the bullet points!

name: Baby Blocks: Swipe & Tap Letters, Spell Words Fast
description: Experience the child like delight of 4 letter word matching and play Baby Blocks today! Tap or swipe letters, form words and advance through 100 exciting levels and 3 challenging skill levels. Learn new words every day with the word of the day feature. Create huge scores with multipliers like speed and color bonus. Use powerful boosters like freeze time to aide you in your word matching endeavors. It’s time to swap those blocks. Baby Blocks, it’s wordilicious!

name: Icontrivia: Guess the Celebrity
description:
From glamorous Hollywood A-Listers to legendary music stars and controversial reality stars to highflying sports personnel, it’s time to guess all your favorite celebrities.
Test your knowledge about these famous celebrities from cinema, music, TV, sports and politics in this highly addictive word guessing game.
Hints & Help: Struggling to guess a celebrity? You can reveal or remove letters to help you figure out the character.
Ask your Friends: Stuck on a puzzle? Share it on Facebook or Twitter and ask for help from your friends and followers.
Play with Friends: Compete with your Facebook friends to see who can guess the most number of celebrities.

name: An Endless Runner and a Word Game Had a Baby...
description:
Make words (3 letters or more) to create platforms so the runner guy can get to the other side! Make the words fast enough or he'll fall to his doom!
Some Quick Playing Tips

name: Word-O-Mania
description:
A fast-paced global multiplayer game where you need to fight your way up to the top of the leaderboard trying to guess as many words as you can in a limited period of time.
Enjoy hours of fun gameplay and improve your word-finding and vocabulary skill!

name: Alpha Zen
description: Alpha Zen is a puzzle game with something to say. In this companion to the critically acclaimed Color Zen, you connect words to build quotes, from literature, pop culture, and philosophy to your own friends' Facebook statuses. As in Color Zen, there are no points or penalties for failure - only you, your headphones, and the collected wisdom of the world.

name: Memory Match IQ Brain Training
description:
Today we all know about the benefits of everyday exercises and good food. We got used to go to gym, watch out for what we eat, but very few know that the informational fast food is that bad for us as fast food for our health. Although our brain doesn’t look like a muscle it needs everyday trainings and ignoring this fact makes your brain work less qualitatively. This will lead Its gradual extinction, to the "senile dementia" or Alzheimer's disease.
So is it possible to prevent this process? Sure! The Brain fitness App includes intellectual push-ups that will help you not only to stay in shape but also improve your brain activity. All exercises are made in game form, you can train any time anywhere: on your way to work or uni, while you stand in a queue, on your sofa or even sitting in a toilet :)
Regular trainings for a few minutes will give you lots of benefits! Just in few weeks you will educate more effective, easily remember new names and numbers, find ways out of difficult situations, easily concentrate, ignore distracting situations, think different, open new talents!
The subscription automatically renews unless auto-renewal is turned off at least 24 hours before the end of the current period.
Payment will be charged to your iTunes account at confirmation of purchase.
Account will be charged for renewal within 24 hours of the end of the current period, and the cost of the renewal will be provided. 
Subscriptions may be managed by the user. Auto-renewal may be turned off by going to the user’s Account Settings after purchase.

name: Word Vs Picture
description:
Play and guess hundreds of words!
New puzzle - crossword with picture.
Play and guess hundreds of words!
New puzzle - crossword with picture.
The game - for real geniuses, check your vocabulary.
If you like crosswords, puzzles, the gallows, the word with words, riddles and other games of this genre - then the "Word / picture" is what you need!
At each level, make come true 4 words, each shown in the picture. As in any crossword they intersect, guess one word - opens a one letter the next, and so on!

name: Word Invaders!
description:
Make words before the invaders destroy your tiles. Think quick to unlock special tiles and bonuses, challenge nasty bosses and test your vocabulary in this challenging and addictive arcade word game.
If you’re a fan of Words with Friends or Scrabble you’re going to love word invaders. The scoring is surprisingly familiar but the game play is from another planet. It’s a frenzied word-lovers delight with 30 levels of dictionary busting fun.

name: Letter Club
description:
Letter Club is the fastest word game on planet!! Making words has never been this exciting!
Challenge your friends or climb the ranked ladder to become the greatest wordsmith the world has ever known. Can you do it? Make as many words as you can to beat your opponent. Be quick though, you have just 60 seconds! Then take your rewards and build your collection by upgrading your letters. Watch as your letters grow stronger and stronger. Unleash their ultimate power .. by making the longest word you can find on the board :P

name: 1000 Word Search Puzzles
description:
De-stress with a relaxing word game all to yourself. We’ve added hundreds of non-timed puzzles so the fun never has to end! Improve your vocabulary skills. Thousands of unique words are used in levels. No repeating words.
It starts out very easy but gets challenging quickly. Find hidden words, slide horizontally or vertically your finger over them, and see the letters collapse. Do it for all words and you will be able to clear the grid.
As you get stuck on a level, which you probably will, remember that there are hints to help.

name: Face Word
description:
Welcome (back) to face control! From the (mostly sane) authors of the (not particularly sane) Face Candy comes Face Word!
Face Word uses the unique Face Mapping feature of ARKit to let you control the game with your face!
Hook the letter candies with your nose and stick your tongue out to slurp them in!
Spell out words to gain points and more time.
Play three different game modes, Normal, Relaxed and Freestyle.
Collect points to unlock new face features, customise your look and unlock a bonus game mode!

name: Logo Quiz: Guess the Image
description:
Looking test your aptitude level or IQ level and improve your general knowledge?
How many Logos & Picture you can Recognise or Guess ?
Start using the most unique quiz and learning app - “Logo Quiz - Guess The Image or Picture” for the most comprehensive list of general knowledge questions. Improving your general knowledge while testing your skills with this quiz trivia app is extremely useful. The “Logo Quiz - Guess The Image or Picture” app includes the most comprehensive categories.

name: Iceberg the Game
description:
Iceberg is based on Heads Up! the fun and hilarious game by Ellen Degeneres that she plays on her show, and you can play this new version with friends!
From learning stories about the person you're on a date with or breaking the ice with new friends to getting to know your close friends even better - Iceberg is the game to play.
Play with at least one other person and go through the decks, each taking a turn to answer the questions - it's also a great way to break the ice with groups or at a bar.

name: Flower Garden: Connect Mania
description:
Lose yourself in a beautiful garden, full of colorful buds.
Connect the same buds to make them bloom. Fill the board to finish the level.
Solve addictive puzzles and transform your garden into a piece of art!

name: Sevn
description:
Throughout history and among many different cultures and religions, the number 7 is believed to be more than just a number.
In this mystical turn based game we honour this extraordinary number.
7 colors. 7 towers each color. Take turn picking towers.
Get all seven towers of one color or get most out of seven colors to win.

name: Fairy Magic Skillz Tournaments
description:
Remove two or more cubes of the same color. Earn the highest score before time runs out.
Easy and fun to play yet challenging to master!
From the creators of Fairy Mahjong comes the online multiplayer puzzle game with unique gameplay and endless fun!

name: Block Puzzle: Gem Legend
description: Block Puzzle: Gem Legend is one of the tetra puzzle games, but it's harder. With the given block, you can arrange it anywhere into the grid. However, you will see 3 blocks in the same time and think to build much full lines as possible. Because the more blocks are shattered the more the score higher.

name: Chop Chop Kicker
description:
Kicking cute dinosaurs and making them fly used to be the national sport of the paleolithic age!
Now, you can re-live the very first flights of the dinosaurs! The magic ink will allow you to draw lines and control the little buddy during his flight.
Use bouncy mushrooms, fat and angry birds, clouds and much, much more to improve your flying distance.
But be careful, the world is hostile and many dangers and obstacles will slow you

name: Mahjong Wonders
description:
Challenge your puzzle skills with over 3000 brain-teasing levels of classic Mahjong.
Embark on an epic Mahjong quest across 60 ancient civilizations that will put Your tile matching skills to the test.
Discover exciting ancient artefacts and treasures along the way!

name: Ice Dig
description:
Play on your Apple Watch, iPhone and iPad!
Ice Dig is an addictive board game that you can play by yourself or online with others.
You and your opponent dig the ice brick in turns, your mission is to dig the ice as much as possible but keep the penguin on top. The one who falls the penguin loses the game.
Ice brick in different color has different weight and value, now get your gears and defeat your opponent!

name: Democracy: The Board Game
description: Democracy is a new game that family and friends can enjoy together. An alternative to Monopoly, its simple and fun to play while at the same time promoting a fairer, cleaner, healthier world for everyone. The game has one goal...Defeat the Dictator!

name: 64 GB: Not 2048
description:
Pair the memory chips and keep multiplying the memory until you reach 64 GB and beyond. Can you really try up to 64 GB?
We will be surprised to see a champion here.
Rattle your brain in this mind blowing memory chip puzzle. It's not like the popular game you think it looks like, we have added additional features to boost your success.

name: Block by Block: Sliding Blocks
description:
During the game you forget about time.
If you enjoy the kind of games with lots of jewels, gems or bubbles you will definitely love Block by Block.
Sense of this game is to remove all blocks from the board.
To do this, click on the blocks with an arrow outside the playing field. The block will begin to move in the indicated direction.
If three or more of the same color blocks form a group, they will disappear.
When the playing field will be cleared of the blocks, level will be passed.
A good game to relax and unwind.

name: Light'em Up: For brainiacs only
description:
Light'em up is a simple, beautiful, easy to play puzzle, yet challenging, and difficult to master.
Tap on the blocks to rotate them, creating a path for the power to flow through the bulbs and lighting them up!

name: Stupid Dog Find Out HD
description:
This one, looking at the game, don’t look away, i’m talking you,
Ok, today, playing this game will make your life changed a lot!
Don’t just stop at the sight,
It is actually a priceless treasure that can change the world and stimulate the pet business, it now has charmed thousands of girls and boys.

name: Wind-Up Maze HD
description: Wind-Up Maze HD is a different kind of maze game. The object of the game is to get the mouse to the end of the maze while collecting as much cheese as you can. What makes Wind-Up Maze HD different is the fact that the mouse guides itself through the maze. Your job is to customize the maze in order to create a path for the mouse to successfully reach the end.

name: Otok
description: This is a very chill Sandbox "City Builder", No Goals, just build your island as beautifully as you can with the given buildings.

name: Pirate Pop Mega Quiz
description: Join Captain Gunpowder Jack as he explores the treacherous yet colorful world of Pirate Pop Mega Quiz! Journey across treasure maps as you answer your way through the numerous levels, help uncover the lost treasures and defeat the evil Captain Liver-bottom.

name: Lines Lines
description:
LinesLines is the most gorgeous smooth brain training classic match puzzle game. Easy to get start but hard to get a high score. In addition to six colored pieces, three props pieces make the game more interesting.
Make five pieces of the same color in a line to remove them from board. New pieces will appear if no piece removing after each piece moving.

name: Tiler More
description: Tiler More is a very fun word building game that you will love. Make words by stacking letters and merging them together. Get all the words to win!

name: Clandestine: Anomaly
description: You receive a mayday hail from an alien vessel that’s on a collision course with your real-world neighborhood. If you don’t act fast, the situation will become catastrophic. Not just for them, but for you and your entire neighborhood.

name: Guess the Movie Game
description: Watch 10 seconds video and guess the movie!

name: Doodle Movie Quiz
description: Try to guess what movie is being depicted in each doodle! In the Normal game mode you can take as much time as you want and go through every doodle available. In One Minute mode, you have exactly 60 seconds to get as many doodles correct as possible! In 3 Strikes mode, you can only get 3 doodles wrong before you lose!

name: A Year of Riddles
description:
A Year of Riddles gives you hundreds of classic riddles to solve.
This game has one riddle for each day of the year. All of them are accessible right away, for you to play at your own rhythm.
Write the solution from the 15 letters available. As soon as the correct solution is entered, the riddle is solved.

name: A Valentine's Day Quizzle
description: Did you know that Cupid has a brother? Or the telephone was patented on Valentine's Day?

name: Monster High: Minis Mania
description:
Ghoulish treats and desserts abound as the Monster High Minis team up to create a cafe to raise funds for their school dance!
There's a chance the next school dance may not happen and the ghouls of Monster High are not having it. Monster High is unlike any high school out there and the students come from all walks of life. From ghosts and werewolves to vampires and sea monsters, everyone is welcome at Monster High and everyone wants this dance to happen! Help the ghouls take over the Creepeteria and turn it into a spooktacular cafe. It’s going to take a team to get this party started, so work hard, hire more Minis and always upgrade your cafe!

name: Cyberlaser
description: CyberLaser is an augmented reality-based puzzle game that uses your real-life environment to enroll you in exciting puzzle challenges. The goal is to guide lasers to the energy crystals using mirrors, portals, and explosions.

name: First Letter
description: Can you find the first letter in the scrambled word? That's the basic idea of FirstLetter.

name: Voice Party
description:
Party games on a whole new level! Transform any ordinary get-together into a super-fun party with 4 amazing games guaranteed to get people laughing! Includes Secnetnes, Noise Master, Sillyrics, and Story Bomb.

Record a sentence and play it back in reverse. Now everyone tries to say that sentence in reverse, and Voice Party records each attempt. Voice Party will play back everyone’s attempts in reverse to see who came closest to saying the original sentence. Get ready for pure nonsense!

Charades with a twist! Without speaking, use sounds and gestures to demonstrate the target word. For an even bigger challenge, you are only allowed to make sounds. How good are you at imitating the cry of an eagle?

Sing the totally random phrases that Voice Party matches to well-known songs. Create and record your nonsensical karaoke musical masterpiece! Just because the lyrics are absurd doesn’t mean you can’t sing your heart out.

Record individual sounds and use them to string together fun stories with your friends. Will you weave a story that actually makes sense? It doesn’t matter!
Connect with friends and see who can rise to the top of the leaderboard as the most skilled party-gamer! Grab some drinks, open a bag of chips and get ready to have a blast: it's time for Voice Party!

name: Pocket Bomberman Blast Heroes
description: Collect power ups to get more powerful bombs! Use the explosive bombs to blast your enemies from across the map! And don't worry if you get blasted, then the fun has just begun!

name: Mr. Ball
description: Mr. Ball encounters big trouble on his way home. The wicked witch has laid many obstacles with her sorceries. Can Mr. Ball avoid all obstacles and get home safely? His destiny lies in your hand! You may set Mr. Ball flying with simply a slice on the screen, avoid all the monsters and traps, you will guide Mr. Ball home! Take this fun challenge with your fingertips, show off your dexterity! Break a leg on this fun mini game!

name: Rhythm Control 2
description: Rhythm Control 2 is now free to play and supported by in game ads. Purchase any song pack to remove all the ads. Rhythm Control 2 is finally here with improved gameplay features, a shiny new interface and a surplus of new tracks to play!

name: The Mystery of Arkham Manor
description:
The Mystery of Arkham Manor is a detective adventure horror game inspired by H. P. Lovecraft's fictionalized world of Arkham.

The player will play as the London Chronicle’s freelance reporter, and he will start the game moments after he arrives by train at the local train station. He has to be both reporter and detective to decipher what has been happening in the villag. But the only clue he has in his possession is Colonel Lemin’s intriguing letter.

During the gameplay there are several characters to be interviewed, objects to be picked up, photographs to be taken, stories to be reported, and questions to be made to the newspaper.

name: Morphman
description:
Morphman is an interactive video game, running via Microsoft Video, where the player plays as Morphman who has the power to change into different creatures. He is on a mission to rescue Professor Roberts, a physicist from performing military experiments. Morphman must take his jet to a mysterious castle on a mysterious island to rescue the Professor.

Morphman plays on a single screen where a video file plays in the top-left corner. He reacts to different circumstances by picking the correct ability when a challenge appears on the screen. The player has a short time to select the correct button press at pre-determined points in the video adventure. During the adventure Morphman is able to absorb the forms of various creatures to help him which are then shown on the interface.

name: The Mystic Well
description: The Mystic Well is a Dungeon Master like RPG. A powerful wizard once enchanted his life force into a golden skull and then proclaimed himself to be a God. After his ascent to Godhood, he conquered the citadel known as Mystic Mirror to show his power. The player must now foil the evil wizard's plan on world destruction.

name: Undertale 2: Overtale
description: Step into the shoes of John Undertale as he attempts to rewrite history to save the ones he loves from an avian catastrophe.

name: The Ormus Saga
description:
The Ormus Saga is a roleplaying game for the Commodore 64.

Beryland, 11th January 1227... This is the day that you decide to start something new. You finally made up your mind. Here begins your journey to fight the enemy. An enemy that seems overwhelming in power and might. Peace and freedom must return to Beryland again. It is a dangerous task that lies ahead, but you feel ready to challenge the Ormus Cult, and their leader Lord Marox.

name: Break Everything: Park
description: The game is a fun shooter made on Unreal 5. You need to use a toy rifle to shoot balls to break all the objects in the park.

name: Animal Shelter Simulator: Horse Shelter DLC
description: In Animal Shelter - Horse Shelter DLC, we take care of much bigger animals that also deserve a good home. This DLC not only includes horses but also new fresh mechanics that will allow you to experience the world of Animal Shelter all over again!

name: The Ormus Saga II: Guild of Death
description: It is January, 7th 1228 in Beryland - Two years after you have successfully defeated Lord Marox, and the Ormus Cult, a new adventure is awaiting our hero. A far more challenging task lies ahead. After reading the Compendium you know of the black Book called Ulbore. The Book has finally revealed the terrible truth about Sullivan and the Brotherhood of the White Rose. It is now up to you to complete 9 tasks provided by God Servants in order to rescue the Kingdom from the Armageddon. You only have appr. 12 months to do so. When the year has passed and you could not manage to enter the Eternal Halls of Carion, the game is over.

name: Cyber West: Hidden Object Games - Western
description: A unique cyberpunk western! Conduct an investigation like a real detective in the world of Cyber Wild West! The newest hidden object game with a storyline. Сarve out your own legend!

name: Panspermia: Horror Myson Mansion
description: After the disappearance of his sister Maria, Marcelo decides to start his search on his own since the police cancel the search for her, Marcelo goes alone to the Myson mansion, which was the last place she visited. A bizarre mystery awaits you at the Myson mansion.

name: Grip on Reality
description: Follow adventures of a crazy wizard casting spells. The spells tend to be quite chaotic and unpredictable. The wizard finds himself embarking on a long quest across the world to uncover the mysterious cult worshipping a crystal, the same crystal powering the wizards staff.

name: Friendly Facade
description: In this visual novel, Maggie Crane and 15 others are invited to partake in the Isolated Society Study, where they must forge a peaceful society while attempting to outsmart each other in complex challenges. Just as the study is about to conclude, the Golding Foundation introduces a sinister twist.

name: Grip on Reality: The Jaguar
description: A pious blood-thirsty warrior with an insatiable need to sacrifice the blood of his enemies to his gods. He wields his blood-letting macuahuitl and calls upon blood magic to bleed his foes. Blood.

name: The Ormus Saga III: The Final Chapter
description:
The Ormus Saga III: The Final Chapter is a roleplaying game for the Commodore 64.

The King of Beryland has once again gone missing, and the creature Azerus of the Ormus Cult has come to power. The player must defeat the Ormus Cult for a third time.

name: 100 Logic Games: Time Killers
description:
Train your brain with 100 (+16) different types of Puzzle Games !
Can't stand Sudoku ? Or actually, maybe you love it, but you’re looking for a change ? These puzzle games are a lot more entertaining and enjoyable, providing similar mental exercise.
Choose among increasingly difficult and big puzzle levels, save your progress, undo, restart and take advantage of the hints to keep going when stuck.
An ideal companion for spare time, with enough variety you’re sure to find at least one game you’ll love.

name: Ghosty Party
description:
Vaporize as many ghosts of the same color as you can to get a high score, with cute halloween theme animations, bonuses, and sound effects.
The more ghosts you tap at once, the more scores you will get. The more same color ghosts combo, the more scores multiply.

name: Mathable
description: The critically acclaimed game of logic, strategy and math skills is finally available on the iPhone and iPad. Mathable challenges players to use simple math equations to score points using the numbers given to them throughout the game. A great way to spend time with family and friends!

name: Toast the Chicken: Hard Puzzle Game Unique Brain Teaser
description: Toast The Chicken is an unique and challenging puzzle game where you have to toast all the chickens with fire. But beware not to hurt yourself or you'r fellow scientists!

name: European Soccer Cup 2016 Slot
description:
Choose your bet from 1 to 15 Paylines and GG Coins and spin the reels.
When the 3 or more Cup poststamp symbols appear you will access the Bonus games.

name: Conquer: Epic of Dice Wars
description: Conquer – Epic of Dice Wars is the best world domination strategy game inspired by the classic online Dice Wars game. Now on your iPad or iPhone, you can play against up to 5 relentlessly smart AI robots or real gamers to overtake their territories and dominate the world.

name: Dices Toss: The Falling Eight Count
description:
Dices Toss will test your reflexes the hard way, despite its simple design.
Your ultimate impossible goal is to keep tapping on falling dices to score more points.
Sounds simple? It's not!

name: Space Walk: Memory Games for Adults
description: Space Walk is a terrific logic game. The board consists of circles with digits. The digits mean a number of fields that can be passed. The aim of the game is to create a way to the exit by properly placing circles on the board. Click on a circle to highlight it. In order to spread the contents consistent with the digit it bears, click on the field next to it. You may spread the circles in all directions.

name: Warsino
description:
On a planet somewhere in the galaxy. An evil arms dealing dictator is running the first ever War Casino... Warsino. The players are a deprived population who are subjugated to slave labor building his weapons of mass destruction. Their only escape is to win the game or lose it all.
Welcome to Warsino. Using the helicopter you control, the objective of the game is defend your base from incoming tanks. You will need to build towers to defend against your enemies. In order to get more towers you will need to play the base slot machine.
We would appreciate any feedback you may have.

name: MilliBilli Slots
description: A tap on your mobile or tablet takes you right into the colorful floors of Vegas. Enjoy the revolutionary, variable dual screen in veritcal style! Active action screen adds a whole lot of fun. Dynamic, vivid sound and amusing game themes are a real treat!

name: Super Citycon: City Builder
description:
Huge and unlimited maps, short construction times and a simulation style economy! 
From Gamers for Gamers: A city building game you will enjoy! 
Build your very own City on beautiful and huge maps. Unlock over 150 Buildings of multiple categories, some of them with multiple variations.
Start with a farm, build your residential neighborhoods, commercial and industrial areas, care about water, food, energy, and waste management.
Take care of your resident's security with police and fire stations, be sure they stay healthy with medical center’s and hospitals.
Make your City a great place to live with parks, sports, and recreation areas!

name: MahJah
description:
Mahjong-solitaire like matching 3D time killer game.
Find matching cubes. Faster you find matches - more scores you earn.
